I will randomise the age of the character, how good or evil she is, her favoured (or most prominent body part), her height, and them make a name for her. So you'll be dealing with totally new characters! I'll write a short bio on each one finished so you know them better.

052.content:
Randomisation results:

Name: Leah
Age: 29
Evil (out of 10): 2
Body Feature: Feet
Height: 6'2"
Hair Colour: Red

Leah is a sweet, tall woman in her late twenties who you know through your mother who used to teach at a university. Your mother once gave private tutoring to Leah to help her catch up after a holiday and they became friends. However, it is a secret from most since it is against university policy. Leah has been to your house a lot and sometimes plays on your Xbox 360 with you, you even had a little crush on her when you were 9. You've always admired how she kicked her flip-flops off when she entered your room, leaving her barefoot. You have lost many games of Halo before because you were too busy staring at her perfect feet. You try to keep it a secret, but you suspect she may have noticed.
Looks-wise, Leah is an unusually tall person with womanly but slim curves, long legs, and amazing, big feet with slender toes. You have guiltily fantasised about her feet before.

Now, pick a storyline and get writing!

choices: "Ooh, I found a new weapon!" Leah says. "It's called... the Shrink Ray?"
Leah puts her feet on your lap. "I hope you don't mind, it's comfy," she says...
Leah pauses the game for some reason...
0523.content:
Lying in your bed, you decide that this is the most boring night in a while. All your best friends are on holiday or something, and there's not even anything good on TV. Grabbing your cell phone, you scroll through your contact list. Richard? He's ill. Mike? He's in France. Lana? She lives too far. Leah? She's... hmm... thinking about it more, you're not aware that she's busy or anything. It was always fun to have her over and play on Halo with her or something. You select her name.
'Hi, are you busy right now? I'm kinda bored and all my other mates are busy.' you text her. Placing the phone back on the bed, you can only hope for a reply.

*about 3 minutes later*

Your phone suddenly begins to vibrate and makes a tone, interrupting a cloud of deep thought you were in. You pick it up and read the text:
'Nope, im bored 2! over in a few mins :)'
You smile, glad that she lives close by. You know Halo is her favourite game, so you turn on the Xbox and set it up.

*5 minutes later*
Just as you finish putting the game on 2-Player mode, your door pushes open gently and Leah walks into the room barefoot. She probably left her shoes downstairs again. You glance at her irresistible feet for a split second and then look her in the eye.
"Oh, hey! I just finished setting up Halo Wars, want a game?" she offer.
"Hell yeah!" she chuckles, taking a seat on one of the two bean bags. "I'm so gonna beat you, I've been practising on my younger brother," she teases.
"Let's see about that, shall we?" you challenge her, glancing at her feet again. She was absent-mindedly wriggling her red-painted toes and gently rubbing her feet against each other.
"Wow, you're losing badly!" she laughs as you suddenly realise that you were wasting time staring at her feet. You begin to hammer the controls, finding a powerful gun to hopefully beat her with. Once again, you look at her feet. It was all you could to to prevent yourself from getting a hard-on. You didn't want to come across as a perv...

05232.content:
Leah suddenly pauses the game, and to your surprise, she swings her legs round and places both of her bare feet on your lap. It's all you can do to contain your happiness!
"I hope you don't mind if I sit like this, Ant!" she says. "I've been having back pain lately and the bean bag is kinda awkward to sit on, this is much better for me!"
"Oh, I don't mind!" you reply, beginning to sweat. "I-if it helps your back, then that's fine."
She smiles at you and unpauses the game. Again, her beautiful toes begin to subconsciously wriggle right in front of you. You were concentrating more on her feet than on the game! Was she doing this consciously to put you off!?
"Come on, Ant! Concentrate!" she laughs, taking away a chunk of your health with a powerful gun. "Stop daydreaming!"
"Y-yeah, sorry," you reply hastily, using all your effort to tear your eyes off her feet and back onto the screen. They smelled a little sweaty, but you didn't care. They're the most perfect feet you've ever seen. So smooth, long and curvy with gorgeous, cute little toes that wriggled enchantingly...

"Ant!" she snaps suddenly, pausing the game again. "Are you OK? You keep zoning out! You just walked straight down a pit!"
"Oh, uh, yeah, I'm alright," you reply. "Just a bit tired I guess."
Leah shifts her feet a little so they're closer to your face. Her heel lands softly on your groin, arousing you beyond belief. However, you manage to conceal it.
"Are you sure there's nothing going on with you?" she asks in a caring tone. "You can tell me," she continues, her toes writhing before your eyes. You glance at them again briefly, but apparently Leah notices as she puts her controller down.
"I can't play this anymore." she says...
05232.title: Leah puts her feet on your lap. "I hope you...

052322.content:
"I mean, if you wouldn't mind..." Leah continues. "The guy in charge of heavy lifting at work today was off sick so I had to fill in for him and boy, do my feet ache."
Your eyes almost pop out of their sockets, unable to believe how lucky you are that she's actually offering this!
"Y-yeah, of course, I mean, if it helps then sure!" you manage, softly placing one hand on each of her feet. You had always wanted to get close to a girl's feet, and Leah's feet were even better. You get to make her feel better too, so there's a worthy cause behind it. Unless she's lying.
"Oooh, your hands are warm!" she laughs as you begin the massage.
"I've never done a foot massage before..." you inform her. You decide to go with what you've read on the internet: first of all you begin by pressing your fingers into her soles and rubbing them in a circular motion, also holding the sides of her feet in your palms and rubbing them up and down. Moving down to the heel of her foot, you put on a little more pressure whilst still rubbing in circles.
"Oh man, you have no idea how great that feels!" Leah groans, laying back in relaxation. "Do you mind doing my toes as well?"
"Of course!" you reply happily, holding each of her big toes between your thumb and finger. You rub them back and forth gently but firmly, occasionally squeezing the tip of her toes and rubbing between toes. You do this on each one, spending about 3 minutes each time. An enormous hard-on is forming but luckily Leah can't see it past her feet. You secretly drape your t-shirt over it in an attempt to hide it.

"Wow Ant, I feel totally better now!" she praises you. "Are you sure you've never done that before?"
"N-nope, not once!" you reply. "I'm glad I could help!"
"So you wouldn't mind if I turned up at your place for foot massages from time to time?" she requests, having obviously enjoyed it.
You hesitate to answer, unsure if it'd be morally right to say yes, but Leah quickly changes your mind by moving her feet a little closer to your face. Now both of her feet lie heel-up on the middle of your chest.
"I'm sure you wouldn't mind," she smiles, wriggling her toes.
"Y-yes, anything, I mean whenever you want-" you stutter enticed by her toes.
"Aww, you're so kind!" she coos, moving her feet even further forward so they're nearly on your neck.
"No, YOU'RE so kind..." you reply, taking hold of her feet again...

05232221.content:
The world slowly began to shift around you, all of your surroundings becoming bigger and bigger, including the woman next to you who'd you been giving a massage not long before.

You had just been in heaven, with the feet you loved so much edging ever closer to you. But, now you were seeing them gradually increase in size until they were bigger than your entire body.

You were no more than one inch at this point. Leah, having nothing anymore to rest her feet on, brought them down and resting her heels on bag chair you were sitting in.

You got up after falling on your butt, looking up to those soft soles towering high, five towering toes at the top that were still wiggling. Between the clandestine feet, you could see the gorgeous face of Leah in the distance. She was looking down at you in amusement.

"Sigh, I gave the opportunity to massage my feet, but I wanted you to enjoy this a little bit more. You like my feet, don't you Ant?" she asked.

Stunned, you noticed right away how Leah's barefeet remained gorgeous even at this size, perhaps even more so. Getting over the shock at the situation, you throw yourself forward prostrate when presented with this opportunity.

"Y-Yes, they're the most beautiful things I've ever seen! Those soft soles, those slender toes, I'm crazy for 'em. They're just as beautiful as the woman they're attached to!" he screamed.

Leah giggled.

"My, such a flatterer, Ant. Why don't we stop the video games and get to something a little more relaxing. I shrunk you to this size so you could enjoy yourself, feel free to enjoy my feet to your heart's content..." she said sweetly.

You start shaking your head rapidly, signaling to Leah that you are very excited to begin exploring her perfect feet. Leah lowers her feet to the floor, so you can reach them easily. But my toes might get a bit rough and playful with you while I play up here. I’m sure you’d rather it be that way though, Ant!” And before turning back on the system, she said “And just to make sure you have as much fun as you can, I’ll make you a little bit smaller.” You realized that she was shrinking you to about 1/3 of an inch, and it made you even more excited.


And after that, Leah began focusing on the game again giving you a chance to play with her slender toes as much as you wished. She started playing some online matches, hoping to improve her skills so she could be Ant more fairly next time. It was even more exciting to think about how those toes would treat you more like a pleasure toy than a person. So you run up to Leah’s left foot and look at the toes up close. It looked like you would indeed be able to spend some quality time with her toes, without her consciously holding herself back. So you squeeze amongst her 2nd and 3rd toes, loving the how their fleshy walls felt on your tiny body. They were almost twice your size, and you began rubbing the space between the two toes hoping for a reaction out of them. And you were successful.


The toes that you were neighboring started squeezing you tightly. They forced you deep inside the space between the toes, forcing even more of her amazing scent into you. You were glad that Leah made you more durable, because you probably would have popped otherwise. After squeezing you harshly, Leah began wiggling her toes wildly, excited that she just got a Triple Kill. For you, it felt like you were getting the most passionate and furious massage of your life, and the best part was that it was being given by the most perfect and amazing toes he had ever seen or felt. Leah brought her left foot over to her right foot and began rubbing her toes together with both feet. You were in the epicenter of this wonderful chaos that these toes were causing. As he rubbed her feet and toes about, you were shuffled and pushed into each of Leah’s long and perfect toes. And you were ecstatic to be able to be played with by these toes, as Leah focused intently up above. You were easily shuffled and transferred from foot to foot, and from toe to wiggling toe. Then things got quite a bit more rough and aggressive down in your heavenly place between Leah’s toes. Leah was having a bit of a losing streak, and she couldn’t even get a single kill for awhile. After a player killed her right after she spawned, she yelled “Damn it!” and stomped her right foot hard. The impact knocked the wind out of you, although this even harsher treatment was just as enjoyable. In fact, part of you liked it even more, and you hoped that Leah’s losing streak would continue and that her feet would get even more aggressive. Then she started tapping her right foot violently, getting more and more frustrated at the game, and you were brutally slammed onto the floor by this angry foot.


But then out of nowhere, Leah got a 7 killstreak and ended up winning the game for her team. She gave a loud victory shout and happily stretched her legs. She squeezed her toes vigorously, and you thought that the toes were trying to celebrate Leah’s victory with you. To you, the entire experience was a victory, as you got to spend time with one of the most beautiful women you knew, up close and personal with her equally godly toes. You hope that this experience will never end, and that you can continue to be used like an insignificant pebble by these perfect toes. My folks will be gone for the weekend! I’d love to spend more time with you! You’re just so amazing!” Leah was flattered by Ant’s compliments and request. We’ll have so much fun this weekend. I’m sure you’ll never forget it!” Leah let out an incredible large grin, and Ant was incredibly excited for their time together.


Leah reached for you, as you were still in-between her 2nd and 3rd toes, and placed you on the palm of her hand. After turning off the Xbox for the night, she walked down stairs. You’ll love it in there.” You agree whole heartedly with what Leah just said. It’d a truly amazing experience to be snuggled in-between her toes and the tight sock. It’d probably smell a bit more, and I have no doubt that my feet will sweat a lot, but I have a feeling that you won’t mind much.” She then winked at you, knowing just how much that will excite you. You think about that too, and she was right. If you were in her moccasin without any socks on, you would be treated to a very sweaty and smelly experience. And that would be an incredible experience for you, if you were able to. Leah interrupted you thoughts and said “Well sweetie? What do you want to do?”

0523222111.content:
You look down at Leah’s well work green socks, and then up at her beautiful and immense smiling face, and you think you’ve come to a decision. Those socks looked so comfortable and the thought of you being snugly wrapped up by that soft cotton fabric excited you greatly. You look up at Leah and shout “I’ve made up my mind, Leah! I’d love to be inside your green sock.” Leah giggles and blows you a kiss, and says “Whatever you want sweetie! I’m gonna give you the ride of your life.” You just could not contain your excitement for what was going to happen next.


Leah casually grabs her green socks and moccasins with her free hand, and sits down on the living room couch. She places the moccasins and green socks next to her on the couch, and reaches for the right sock. She opens up the sock and shakes it a little bit, hoping to un-jumble it a little bit. Once she was finished she positioned it next to the hand that was holding you, and began talking to you again. “I hope you’re ready Ant,” Leah exclaims “Because you’re gonna experience true bliss soon!” You look down into the green sock, and you can barely see the end of it. And the smell emanating from it is incredibly potent, and it is mesmerizing you even more.


Leah then alters the way she would hold you with her hand, and grasps you between her index finger and her thumb. She starts to dangle you precariously over the opening of the sock, and you began trembling with excitement. Before she drops you, she says “Okay Ant. Enjoy to your heart’s content!” You are let go by her nimble fingers, and you slide and tumble you way down the cotton fabric, almost like a slide. Though, this is the greatest slide you have ever experienced, because all around you, you could practically feel the smell of Leah’s feet. It was as if your entire atmosphere consisted of Leah’s foot odor and sweat, and you loved every second of it. It was pure ecstasy.


Once you reach the bottom, you become acquainted with the toe section of her favorite green sock. It was amazing. Leah then calls down to you, bring her face close to the opening of the sock. It’s amazing to think about just how huge Leah was right now compared to you, and you sometimes need to spend a minute appreciating that face. She coos “Wow! I can’t even see you down there! But I hope you’re ready, because I’m gonna put my sock on now. And I’ve got 5 toes that are hungry for a playmate, you look perfect to them. Have fun down there, Ant!” And with that, Leah brought her face away from the sock and outside of your view. Even though the inserted foot darkened your surroundings, you could still make out her beautifully red painted toe nails.


In its place was, as Leah promised, her titanic and incredible foot. As she wormed her foot into the sock, she wiggled her toes, which seemed excited to be back in their favorite cotton covering. As she pulled the sock to keep it snugly attached to her foot, you were pressed into the space between her 3rd and 4th toes. Now that you were back in-between her toes, but also insulated by this well worn green sock, the smell grew and grew. With nowhere for it to dissipate to, it remained inside the sock, and it caused you to experience Leah’s toes in a completely different light. You still loved being with her toes, and the smell surrounding you only confirmed to you that you made the right decision. She gave you a few hearty squeezed before putting on her moccasins. And the moccasins increased the overpowering smell even more, which you were very happy to experience.


As Leah walked home, you were regularly crammed into her toes, and you were snug enough between them for them to absorb most of the impacts. As Leah walked, she thought of all the things she could do with Ant when she got home. She lives by herself in a small apartment, so she’d have enough privacy with him. Maybe she could introduce him to one of her friends. She’s heard them express their liking for Ant before, thinking he’s a pretty cute kid. Though, she’d ask Ant first with that one because he wouldn’t have known them very well. And while she thought, you were getting coated with Leah’s sweat. Though the sock absorbed most of it, he still got a healthy amount of sweat sent his way. But whatever Leah was planning for her little buddy, she should probably give him a chance to clean himself off. No matter how much he liked her feet, she doubted that he’d like to smell like that ALL the time. Although, she giggles after thinking that maybe he’d like to smell like that.


As she walked, she looked through her contacts, wondering who Ant might like to spend time with too. After looking for a few minutes, and continually treading on you of course, she found someone perfect.

**Info for quick reference**
Name: Anita Lee
Age: 32
Evil (out of 10): 3.5
Height: 5'11" (and a half)
Hair Color: Dark Black

The person Leah found was her friend, Anita Lee. She and Leah were friends from back in their university days. They worked together a lot while they went to school together, and she went to Ant’s house a few times to meet his mom, who tutored Leah frequently. Ant always thought she was a nice person, but never really interacted with her personally, apart from those dinners. Now Anita works at their university’s library in the archives section. She was very cheerful, and Leah rarely saw her without a smile on her face. And luckily, Anita lived in the same apartment complex as she did, so they could easily set this plan up.


She is an Asian woman in her early 30s. She is fairly tall, and is almost as tall as Leah. She has dark black hair that goes down to her shoulders, and she wears it in a part going over the left side. She also has dark black eyes. She wears a pair of thick rimmed glasses. She likes to wear blouse shirts with nice dress pants, and normally wears flats. She also has large feet too, although they are smaller than Leah’s were. Leah thought that Ant would enjoy getting a chance to spend time with Anita too. She could even put him in unknowing situations with her, making sure that Ant had fun. But that might be a bit mean spirited. She’d definitely ask him first about these plans.


Once she made it to her apartment, she kicked off her moccasins, and you got dislodged momentarily. You were flung against the cotton barrier and got sent right back to her toes. You wound up between her 2nd and 3rd toes now, and they began squeezing and wiggling you as if they were saying hi. Leah sat down on her bed and removed her right sock carefully. As she started removing it, she let you go so you would fall back down on the cotton fabric. She then shook you out and you landed on her bed. She was lying down, looking down at you. You thought that she looked completely amazing from this angle and you started to yell to her. You said, between exhausted and satisfied gasps, “Leah; that was amazing! You’re completely amazing!” Leah giggled and responded “Aww thanks little guy! You really know how to make a girl happy.” Then she sat back up and motioned you to climb onto her palm. She then lifted you up, pushing you down because of the G-force.


Then Leah started speaking, and you know that she already has plans for you. Leah said “Okay, while we were walking together, I thought of a few potential ideas on what we could do first. Now it’s still pretty early for a Friday, so I thought it would be fun to invite one of my friends over. You remember my classmate Anita? We still keep in touch and I’m sure that that she’d love to see you right now. She always thought you were cute. And we could even put you somewhere that she’d never expect, so you could have some unknowing adventures with her. And I can attest that she can be very active with her feet too, so you’d be entertained.” After that first option, Leah stopped for a moment to breathe and let it sink in for you. You did think that Anita was nice, and you have to admit that you’ve taken glances at her feet too, whenever she came over for dinner. And she always got really wild with her flats. It could be fun, but you also didn’t know her nearly as well as you knew Leah, so you were a bit hesitant.


Leah continued “But I know that you’re a little dirty right now.” She giggled at her own pun, although you groaned playfully, and she used her finger to mess with and dominate you. “Hey!” Leah retorted “I thought it was pretty funny.” Then she went on “You could probably use a bath or something. As much as you were having fun playing with my feet, and trust me I was having fun too, I’d rather not handle you when you’re covered with my sweat. And I’m sure you don’t want to be constantly covered with dirt and grime while we spend time together, right? I hope at least.” She laughed after that last one, and you thought it over too. You looked at yourself, and realized just how filthy you were. You were amazed Leah was willing to hold you right now, although it was all HER dirt and filth to be fair. She then quickly added “Oh, but don’t think you need to pick one or the other! We can always call up Anita after you get cleaned off. It’s still early in the night, after all!”


You sat down and thought about what you should do. Both options sounded good to him. And he could always do one after the other. They weren’t mutually exclusive after all. But you are glad that Leah is being so flexible with her what you guys can do, and the order in which you do them in. Leah finally asked “So what do you want to do? I’m game for either, or both, of course!”

You don’t know her very well, but she was always nice whenever she was over your house, so you wouldn’t mind getting to know her a bit better. You begin yelling up to Leah, and say “Hey Leah! Do you think you could invite Anita over? I think that could be a lot of fun!” Leah laughs and says “Sounds good to me Ant. I’ll send her a text. We can figure things out after that.”


Leah texts Anita, and asks her to come over. She just says that they should hang out. She also adds that it’s the weekend, so they should live a little and have some fun together. She does not tell her anything about Ant, or his current size. Once she sends the text, she looks down at Ant. You look at your arms and legs, and you realize that you’re pretty dirty after all. Leah seems to notice too and begins to say, “You know, even if you don’t want to completely shower right now, you can still wipe yourself off. I’ve got some nontoxic antibacterial skin wipes that you could use.”


You decide to take her up on that offer. She grows you slightly; so you could wipe yourself off easier. Now you were about 3 inches, and it surprised you how much a few inches could make when you’re this tiny. She grabs a wipe and shrinks it down a bit. It shrinks until it’s the size of a towel for you. You use it to wipe off your arms, legs, hand, and face, getting rid of all the dirt and grime you were given by Leah’s playful toes. After you finish up, she returns you to your 1/3 of an inch stature. Then Leah gets a text from Anita, saying that she was on her way now, and that she was looking forward to hanging out for the night.


Anita finally makes it over. Since it was late, she decided to wear some night clothes. She wore a silk pajama top and bottom, along with fluffy blue slippers. She was not wearing socks with them. Anita says “Hey Leah! How have you been?? I feel like we never get the chance to hang out anymore. It’s great to see you!” Then Leah responds “It’s good to see you too, Anita! It’s crazy that we rarely see each other, since we live in the same complex. Are you ready to have fun?!” They then begin giggling profusely. You hear them greet each other, and you can see how good of friends they were. You also noticed that she wasn’t wearing socks with her slippers, so they’d probably be fun to play around in. And he was also sure that her toes would be sweaty because of the slippers, and he would enjoy getting to know them up, close, and personal.


Anita and Leah chat for a little while, and Anita immediately slips out of her slippers and begins to play with them roughly. Ant is currently sitting on Leah’s lap, away from Anita’s view. He can still see under the table, so he has a clear view of whatever Anita and Leah do with their feet down there. Anita begin grabbing at her slippers with her long and slender toes, kneading them thoroughly. She then grips the tighter and begins swinging her legs wildly, shaking her slippers madly in the process. Then she swings both legs up, and they almost reach where you are hiding out, and slam back down. And as Anita does her mad leg dance, Leah is playing with her moccasins as well. She never put back on her green socks after taking you out of them before, so she played with them bare. You also notice how their feet would sometimes touch as they both played and swung chaotically. Whenever that happened, you’d hear faint giggles followed by their toes rubbing each other furiously. You hope that you can be in the center of that game of footsies soon.


Eventually, Anita gets up to get a drink, leaving her fluffy slippers behind. At this point, Leah tells you about their game plan. Leah says “Okay, here’s where things get interesting! I can present you to Anita once she comes back, so we can all do something together. Or, I can sneakily drop you in Anita’s slipper with my toes, for now. But you gotta choose fast, because she won’t be gone for long!” And with that, you think about what you want to do next.
05232221111.title: Inviting a Friend

choices: Spend the game inside Anita’s slipper
Have Leah get you a controller, and play with your gigantic friends
052322211111.content:
You decide that it’d be best if Anita saw you first, so you yell to Leah “Can you present me to Anita? I’d rather her see me sooner, rather than later.” Leah complies and places you on the table. She then says “Once she gets back, I’ll tell her all about you!” You’re a little nervous right now, although it’s most likely because of you not knowing Anita as well as Leah, but you calm yourself by imagining this as an opportunity to get to know her better. And besides, what did you have to be afraid of? Every time you’ve seen or interacted with Anita, she’s been incredibly nice and friendly to you. This should be no exception, right?


You can hear Anita walk back, with her glass of soda, and you were amazed at how tall she looked even from the table. You can’t imagine how tall she must look from the floor. She sits down and Leah begins to speak, saying “Hey Anita. You remember Ant right? He’s that university professor’s kid.” Anita responds, “Yeah I remember him. He was a nice kid. Pretty mature too, for his age. How’s he doing?” Leah smiles and says, mischievously, “Oh, he’s doing pretty well. In fact, if you look down at the table, you might see for yourself.” Anita looks confused and replies “What are you talking about?” and looks down. She scans the table, looking for whatever Leah was hinting at, and her eyes met yours. At first, she didn’t really react, and just blinked a few time rapidly, and she probably thought she was seeing things. But then her jaw dropped, and brought her face right up to you, where her nose almost touched you. She then backed up a bit, though he face still filled both your peripheral and central vision, and then she began to speak.


Anita said, confused and shocked, “Ant, is that you?! Why are you so small?? What the hell is going on?!” Leah tried to calm her down and said “It’s okay Anita! I was hanging out with Ant a bit earlier today because all of his high school friends were away for the summer and his folks weren’t home. He was just bored. So we played some Halo for a little bit, and then things escalated from there!” She giggles after finishing and Anita didn’t seem completely convinced. She began questioning Ant, saying “Is that true Ant? Are you alright? Is everything really okay?” You respond, by yelling of course, and say “Everything’s totally fine! Leah shrunk me and made me super durable. She wanted to hand out for the weekend.” And with that, Anita finally was convinced and said “Well if you insist. I’m glad you’re okay. And its nice to see you! And I meant what I said about you earlier. You’re a nice and mature little dude! Thought I guess you’re a lot littler now.” She laughed at her own joke, which earned rightful groans from both you and Leah.


But the Anita leaned back in her chair and looked to Leah, and asked “Well what now? Is he really as durable as Ant said? Will he be safe at this size?” Leah reassured Anita and said “Of course. I’d be heartbroken if I seriously hurt Ant! This is completely safe for him, and he has been having such a great time already. I just wanted to include you too.” Anita smiled, confident that Leah is too kind to hurt anyone, especially a friend of hers. So Anita replied, “So what should we do? You said that this was so we could play with Ant, right? Did you have something in mind? And in fact Leah did, and she was about to explain her idea to Anita.


Leah explained “Well, Ant here really liked my feet. I guess he’s into that. You know I’m not the type to judge what people are into. And I know that you’re the same way. People like what they like after all.” Anita nodded in agreement. As she thought about it, she noticed that Ant was steal glances down by her feet from time to time, especially whenever she played with her shoes. She thought nothing of it at the time, but it did explain things. And it did not bother her, as Leah said, because she also thought that what people liked was their own business; as long as they were respectful of others, at least.


So Leah continued, saying “So I had a neat idea. Why don’t we play some Halo split-screen, on my Xbox? I know you like Halo too right, Anita?” Anita agreed that she really enjoyed playing first-person shooters when she had down time. They were a great way to reduce stress after a busy day. But then she thought of Ant, and was confused as to what she was going to have him do, so she asked “Wait; what about Ant? Isn’t he a bit too small to play with us?” Leah giggles and answers, “Of course. But I don’t know if Ant really wants to play Halo with us. I think he’ll have a much better time inside your slipper, playing around with your toes. If you don’t mind, of course! But I guess I could always shrink down a controller for him, instead.” Anita thought for a second, and while she didn’t really object to the idea, she wondered if it would get distracting. She could be pretty competitive, but she decided to ask Ant’s opinion about it first. She’d let him decide.


So Anita looked down at Ant, and asked him “So what do you think Ant? I’m sure you’re aware of how wild I get with my shoes. This will be no exception. And I’ll be focused on the game, so it’ll definitely get rough for you down there. But if you’re certain, I won’t object. But remember, I warned you! I doubt my toes will show you any mercy!” She let out a light giggle after finishing, and you got to thinking. You’d definitely enjoy being inside Anita’s slippers. You got a nice sneak peak of what it could be like, and it looked really fun. And since she’d be completely focused on the game, she’d probably get really aggressive and dominating with you. And that prospect excited you to no end.


But you also wouldn’t mind a light Halo break. And maybe this time you could actually focus and do well. And as you considered your options, Anita interrupted your thoughts and asked “Well Ant? Did you make up your mind? I’m cool with both.” So you decide to:
052322211111.title: Anita Learns the Truth

choices: Get Ant cleaned off and go to the diner
Stay at the apartment, and do something there
0523222111111.content:
You think things over, and you look down at Anita’s feet. They are still playing around wildly, and you would really like to spend time with those feet and slippers. You yell up to Anita and say “Anita! Can I spend the game inside you slipper? As long as you don’t mind!” And Anita giggles and responds by saying “Oh of course it won’t bother me, sweetie! But are you sure? There’s no telling how wild they’ll get while Leah and I play.” You’re convinced and give her a confirmatory nod. She accepts and picks you up, and lifts you towards her face. She says “Oh, you’re gonna be a lot of fun for me down there. You made me a very happy girl, Ant. Thanks a bunch!” She then lowers her hand towards the right slipper, and angles her hand so you slide down into it.


You wind up landing face first inside of her well-worn slipper, and you’re finding it difficult to get back up. You notice that the fluffy material is damp and sticky, slowing you movements considerably. But with a great amount of effort, you reach the toe section before their game started. And luckily, Anita left you alone while you trekked, and you wondered if she did that on purpose or not. And once you got there, the smell hit you like a truck. It was incredibly strong, and surrounded you like a different atmosphere. You were sure that Anita wore these things often, and probably didn’t wear socks often either, but you loved the smell regardless of how strong it felt. It felt like you could practically feel the smell wash and wave around you, almost as if it were a hot and humid mist or fog. And eventually, the game begins up above and the feet return down below.


You look out towards the entrance of the shoe, and see her left foot enter it. It worms its way until it reaches as far as it can fit, and wiggles triumphantly. She then swings her leg up, sending you flying towards the writhing toes. They snatch you up, and begin feeling you up thoroughly. After they get a good feeling of you, they begin to squeeze you, which shoves you in the space between her 2nd and 3rd toes. Then the foot you were attached to leaves the right slipper, and makes its way to its correct mate. As it moves, you can see Leah and Anita intently focusing on the game, not caring about what their feet, and toes, do to you down here. And you wouldn’t have it any other way.


Anita eventually gets her left foot into her left slipper and shoves it all the way in, wiggling her toes madly while she did it. And those wiggles threw you about around her toes, and their ferocity knew no equal, in your mind. You then heard her make victory cry, and you could hear the game announce “Triple Kill”, and that cry convinced you that it was Anita who just got that. She began swinging her legs back and forth, as a way of celebrating her victory, and slammed down her left slipper suddenly and powerfully. After slamming her left foot, she scrunched her toes aggressively, trying to rub her toes against the fluffy material of the slippers as hard as she could. That slam nearly knocked the wind out of you, and you knew that this was only the beginning, but you were still having fun of course.


But then, the tides turned, and Leah was starting to get some victories. This annoyed and angered Anita to no end, and she took out that frustration on her slippers, so she could keep her cool up above. At this point, you weren’t even a factor; and in fact, she almost completely forgot that you were her tiny little passenger in her slipper right now. She started squeezing her toes with a previously unknown intensity, and it really tests the limits of your durability. You were mashed and crammed into incredibly tiny cracks and folds within her toes, and they gave your experience a whole new level. Part of you hoped Anita would keep on losing, just to see how aggressive and relentless her toes got. Then she took her feet out of her slippers, and started sliding and rubbing her soles across the carpet. She then started rubbing her toe across the carpet next.


In her mind, she felt a slight itch in-between her left toes, and tried focusing all of her frustration and anger on that itch, in an attempt to painfully eradicate it. Sadly, she completely forgot that the ‘itch’ that she became so intent on grinding away was actually you, and she probably wouldn’t remember until she started winning again. And who knew how long that would take. Hopefully your durability will hold out against all of Anita’s competitive rage. She started grabbing one of the table ends, and kneaded it with her toes harshly. This continued to mash you into her sweaty flesh. The she moved her feet towards the carpet, and rubbed her toes across it furiously, and you thought you’d get a serious rug burn at this rate. Then, in her final attempt to end this annoying tiny itch, she brings her feet together. She shoves both of them deep into one of her slippers, and pushed them in a far as they could go. You were slowly smashed by this sandwich of toes and feet, and the tight space of the slipper mashed you even worse. She rubbed her feet against each other, and wiggles and scrunched her toes relentlessly, all in an attempt to crush the life out of that little itch that was bothering Anita so much; too bad no one reminded her that it was you. But finally, when it seemed like you’d finally reach you limit, Anita pulls around the game and nets her the victory. Leah is annoyed, but still content because she played a good, close, game.


Anita immediately lets up on her crushing and pulls out both feet. She stretches her legs out, and wiggles her toes happily and enthusiastically, and you were still stuck in-between her 2nd and 3rd toes on her left foot. It felt like the toes were rubbing you a lot more affectionately and lovingly than they were earlier, and even though having them ruthlessly dominate you was intensely enjoyable, somehow you liked their loving side a lot more. She then looks back down at her toes, remembering her little toe buddy, and brings her left foot to her lap. She peels you off and giggles at you and says “Hey little guy! I hope you had fun down there. Sorry I got a bit crazy near the end there. But I did warn you, right?” Then, she starts laughing, and smiles at you, before Leah talks about what they should do next.


Leah looks at you and starts saying, “Man you look rough Ant! I guess you had a wild time down there, huh? Now, I had a couple ideas on what we could do next. It’s not too late, so we could always head to the local diner for some late night dinner. They should be fine with us dressed like this, so it wouldn’t be a problem. We should probably wash you off first, so you can eat without a grime covered body.” Anita giggles and says “Yeah sorry Ant. Guess I got a bit carried away there, huh?” The Leah continues “But we don’t need to go out. I’ve got enough food in the fridge, and we could always play a board game or watch some movies. It’s your choice!”


So you think things over. If there was one thing that was exhausting you, it was having to make all of the choices. Though, you appreciate these titanic goddesses letting you make the decisions. Because, you knew that if they really wanted to, they could make you do whatever they wanted. It made you really glad to know that you have the pleasure to spend time with the nicest titanesses around.
0523222111111.title: Quality Time with Anita’s Toes

choices: Go back to the apartment in Anita’s slipper
Go back to the apartment in Leah’s moccasin
05232221111111.content:
You take a good look at yourself, and see all of the dirt and grime that you’ve accumulated because of acting as a personal love bug for Anita’s toes. And realize that because you only partially cleaned off yourself before Anita came over, parts of you had gunk and junk from both Anita, and Leah from earlier. As much as you loved being treated like a pleasure toy by both Leah’s and Anita’s gigantic and perfect toes, you’d rather not eat with the stuff on you right now. So you yell up to your gentle titan friends, and say “Can we go out to eat? I am pretty hungry, and diners are always fun!” Anita agrees with you and Leah says “Sure thing Ant! I’ll get you all set up so you can clean yourself off first.” Leah then goes into the bathroom, probably to mess with something in there so you can have a somewhat normal shower, and left you with Anita. You look up at her and she has a playful grin, and that worries you.


She says down to you, “Ant! Hop back in my slipper for a bit! My toes aren’t done with you yet!” You try to object, but she knocks you off of the table and back into her smelly slipper. She coos “Oh what’s the harm Ant? You’re gonna get clean soon anyway!” You knew that you wouldn’t win the argument, so you just let Anita do what she wants, as you couldn’t stop her even if you tried. She drops the slipper on the floor before worming her foot back in, and her toes immediately pounced on their little buddy. She quickly removes her foot from the shoe after capturing you and begins squeezing you, pushing you into their sweaty folds, and you love being dominated by them. Then she slams her foot back into the slipper, and begins to knead your tiny body with her 2nd toe, pushing it up and down you vigorously. You begin to push against the giant toe, and Anita coos “Oh, the bug’s fighting back? Be careful! You might just excite your captors even more!” She then pushes the toe against you harder and harder, with each repetition shoving you deeper into the fabric. Once you felt like you were stuck to the fluffy material, Anita shakes the slipper wildly, dislodging you and moving you about. Once you land into one of her toe spaces, she squeezes you tightly, as a final loving and sweaty embrace. She then removes her foot from the slipper, and peels you away from her toes. She then says “Ant you feel so great down there, you have no idea!” You try to look frustrated, but you can’t hide your satisfaction, and then Anita gives a mischievous grin. She says, “And speaking of ideas, I think I’ve just got one!”


You wonder just what Anita means by that before she unceremoniously drops you onto the floor. Before you are able to get up, she slams her foot back onto you, until she gets a grip of you with her toes. Anita says to you, “Hey Ant, guess what? Leah left her moccasins on the other end of the table! You thinking what I’m thinking?” You immediately figure out what Anita is planning, and you’re honestly excited for what’s to come. You’ve never got to experience Leah when she was truly unaware of your existence, and Anita was about to provide you with that opportunity. She stretches her leg and drops you into Leah’s moccasin, and you fall flat on your face. Anita blows you a kiss before grabbing her phone to browse around. The first thing you notice is the strong smell, which dwarfed what you had experienced in Anita’s fluffy slipper earlier, and you were ecstatic to be surrounded by Leah’s natural musk again, thinking back on your experience coming over here. You run madly to the toe section, hoping that she does not notice you too quickly, and you soon hear Leah’s footsteps.


She announces, while standing, “Okay! I’ve got the shower ready!” She the looks down, realizing that you are nowhere to be found, and she turns to Anita. She asks, “Where did Ant go?” Anita responds, putting down her phone, “Oh yeah, he said he was going for a walk! Why don’t you sit down? He’ll come back soon.” Leah complies and sits, working her feet back into her moccasins, stopping them just before where you were, disappointing you. You consider going to them, but you think that she might discover you unless they come to you naturally. She has a slightly concerned look before Anita says, as a way to keep her friend distracted, “Hey! Did you hear about what happened with that one girl from school?!” Leah quickly focused on Anita, as Anita knew that Leah was a sucker for any and all gossip, regardless of who it was about. You were glad that Anita had you back on this one, and you knew that you owed her one after this. You watch as Leah puts her foot all the way in, and her 3rd toe pins you down inside the sweaty moccasin, as Anita and Leah talk about gossip.


Leah’s 3rd toe rubs into your tiny body, massaging you from head to toe, and covers you in another layer of grime and sweat. It starts to rub harder and harder, and faster and faster, as their conversation goes on above, and you are having an amazing time. Leah then shakes her shoe, sending you wildly about inside the moccasin, and you stop under her sole. She then stomps down, which engulfs your body in her sweaty flesh, and she feels a strange sensation in the back of her mind, but she is too focused on her gossip to consciously react to it. She instead rubs her shoe across the carpet, rubbing you back and forth across her sole as well, and it eventually sends you back under her toes thanks to the ample supply of her lubricating foot sweat. Her toes then grab at you, wanting to squeeze and rub you vigorously, and you respond by kissing and licking whenever you are able. Your affectionate actions toward her toes cause them to act even more loving towards you, which meant that they’d rub you even harder. Eventually, Anita carefully changes the subject and asks, “Hey, is Ant not back yet?” This snaps Leah’s mind back into reality, and she realizes that something is stuck in-between her toes. She quickly takes out her foot and looks for Ant, peeling him off once she does.


She asks him “You alright? How’d you wind up in my shoe, Ant?” You respond with “Oh it was my fault. I was sitting down near you end, just looking around, when I slipped and fell. I ended up inside the moccasin and you couldn’t hear me.” Leah smiles at you, but sternly says “You’ve gotta be more careful, okay Ant?” It was a stern, but concerned reaction, and you knew that she cared deeply about you. You nod, and Leah turns around to bring you to the sink. While Leah’s back is turned, you give Anita a thumbs up, and she gives you one back, content with the mischief she stirred. Leah leaves you in the bathroom as you wash off, and you are impressed with her makeshift sink shower, and you quickly scrub yourself clean. Once you are finished, the three of you head to a local I-HOP, ready for some nice food. Leah places you inside her handbag, so you’ll be safe and clean when they get there.


Once you’re all there, Leah and Anita make their orders. They order food only for themselves, because you didn’t need nearly as much food at your current size. After the food arrived, Leah let you out of her purse. She sectioned off a small amount of scrambled eggs and a bit of pork for you, so you could eat without getting in your gigantic friends’ way. You knew that you were super durable, but that probably didn’t protect you from being eaten, and that’s the last thing you wanted to. One thing you noticed as you were in your small corner, was how intimidating Leah and Anita looked as they ate, and you wondered if that was simply because of their size relative to you. The silverware clanging against the plates was deafening, and it was almost as loud as the women themselves were as they ate, where you could audibly hear their chews and bites. You also looked around the restaurant, and your vision blurred a bit after your table, reminding you of your current stature. At one point, Leah used her straw to get a tiny amount of iced tea, and she hovered her straw over you. The amount was small enough so that it was the size of a normal glass, and you drank from Leah’s straw, not too worried about sharing drinks.


Once everyone ate their fill, you could hear Leah and Anita give contented sighs. They both went to wash their hands, in shifts of course, so nothing would happen to you while they were gone. Once they were finished, they both looked down at you, and you were surprised by the sudden attention. The Leah picked you up and said “I hope you enjoyed your meal Ant! It must be convenient to only need a few scraps of food to be satisfied, huh?” You agree that being to eat your fill with a few bits of eggs was cool, but it wasn’t quite as satisfying as having a full meal. You quickly as “Hey Leah, are you able to shrink food? Because I’d enjoy that a lot more. Leah thought about that, and said “I’ll have to see. It’s an interesting idea at least. She then added “I think it’s time to head home. And now that you don’t need to be clean anymore, I think it’d be okay if you came back in a shoe, don’t you agree Anita?” Anita replied, “Yeah, that’d be fun! You should come back in my slipper, Ant! We’ll have a great time.” She then winks at you while licking her lips, and you know that she’s good at convincing you of doing things. But Leah interjects, “Or you could come with me. You know how fun my shoes can get, too.” You’re at an impasse. You like both Leah’s and Anita’s feet, and it was always difficult when picking one over the other. But you had to decide, and you eventually decide to:
05232221111111.title: Time to Eat!

choices: You choose to go back with Anita, for the night
You choose to stay with Leah, for the night
0523222111112.content:
You think it over, and you’ve finally come to a decision. You yell up to your titanic friends and say, “Okay! Can I play Halo with you guys?” Both girls start laughing and Leah reaches for a third controller. Once she gets it, she shrinks it down so you can use it effectively. Anita then picks you up and places you in the palm of your hand, and the three of you make your way to the couch. Anita sits down first while Leah sets up the game console. She looks at you and says, “I heard that you and Leah play Halo a lot. Just so you know; I’m not half bad myself. Prepare to lose!” She sticks her tongue out at you, and you respond by saying, “In your dreams! I’ll be the one to win tonight!”


Leah then turns to Anita and asks, “Can put Ant down there on the floor? I set up a small, shrunken, beanbag chair so he can sit comfortably. It’s right under the end table.” Anita spends a moment looking for the spot, and puts you down once she finds it. At your size, the TV monitor looks more like a movie screen because it was so big. The only thing that really concerned you was the table that blocked their view of you. You hoped that they would keep their wandering feet away from him, at least until they were finished playing. You looked back, and saw that Anita was on your left and Leah was on your right. Each of their outer facing feet loomed a bit closer to than you would like right now.


Then Leah explained the matches they would play for the night. She said “First, we’ll play a few free-for-all matches together. This is for an informative qualifier of how everyone does. Then, after a few of those, the 1st and 2nd place qualifiers will take the first duel. And after that, the loser of the first duel will face the last place player in the qualifier. Sort of like a redemption match! And finally, the winner of the first duel will face the winner of the redemption match. And that one will be a sudden death match, for some extra tension! And whoever wins that match is the Halo champion for the night. Sound fun?” You thought it sounded pretty fun, and it seemed like Anita did too, because she said “That sounds good to me. I know who will be the champion tonight!” She then stomped her right foot to emphasize her point, and it shook you a bit. Then Leah said “Oh really? I think I’ve got a pretty good idea too!” And then she stomped her left foot down harder than Anita did, making you, and your beanbag chair, almost jump in the air. You were also glad that you’d get some down time, because you’d love to take that chance to admire Leah’s and Anita’s awesomely huge and powerful feet, as they play about around you.


And with that, the game began! Everyone scrambled to get a good starting weapon and position. And at the same time, both Anita and Leah took off their shoes to let their feet prowl around. They would shuffle their shoes around erratically and would press down on parts of them with their toes to flatten them. It was a bit distracting, and you have a feeling that they were doing this on purpose to beat you easier, but you fight temptation and focus on the game. At one point, you nearly beat Anita with that powerful gun you found, but at the last second, Anita’s right foot slams into you and your beanbag chair, saving her from death. It stays on you for a few seconds, rubbing you back and forth with her sole giving you an amazing but unwanted massage. It lasted until Anita beats you instead, and once that happens, her foot suspiciously leaves you alone, content to end that massaging there. You hear Anita yell down to you, “Oh, I’m sorry Ant! I didn’t realize you were sitting so close to my foot. You should be more careful, little guy!” And then she started giggling, and you had a feeling that it was no accident after all. But you weren’t complaining, because you loved how Anita’s sole felt as it massaged you like that.


Then the qualifier round was over and the scores were in. First was Anita with 7 kills, second was Leah with 4 kills, and in last place was you, with 2 kills. Leah and Anita both giggled at the results, and Anita teased you, saying “What’s wrong Ant? I thought you were supposed to be good at Halo?” You are a bit annoyed, but you won’t let it get to you, because it’s all in good fun. And besides, you could play Halo with them anytime. You couldn’t get a titanic foot to massage you so vigorously every day. Then the first duel round begins, with both titans duking it out for victory. And as they fought, their feet seemed to get even more spirited. Then, you see Leah’s left foot and Anita’s right foot worm their way to your center area. You were excited, and a bit apprehensive for what would happen next. Then, both feet stopped mere inches from you, and you could practically reach out to them from where they were. And then, as you predicted, the toes of Anita and Leah make contact, slamming into both you and each other, flattening you against their titanically writhing digits. Both pairs seem to be fighting each other, madly rubbing against each other, and you are in the center of the maelstrom. And as they fight and wiggle about, you are grabbed by each and every one of their angry and competitive toes. You get shoved deeply into each space between each of the toes, and you were given an up close, and personal, tour of each and every one of their toe cracks and folds. You felt like they were fighting more over their possession of you in-between their toes, to spend the rest of the match with to be enthusiastically loved and ruthlessly dominated, than against each other. You really liked this experience though, because it honestly felt like each one of their toes were trying to crush and pulverize you into dust; which made it all the more exciting. But they eventually calm down, and begin to leave you alone, and you are finally able to free yourself and get your bearings.


You make it back to your seat just in time to see Anita claim victory. She celebrates by grabbing her slippers with her toes, and swings them wildly. Leah taps her foot a few times, trying to work out her post-game frustration, and those taps bounce you about. It was especially worrying because her foot was still mere inches from you, and if she angled it a bit to the left, she’d crush you instead of the carpet. The next round is you vs. Leah, and you don’t plan on losing this time, remembering your loss earlier today. You both play your best, but you edge away with victory in the end. Leah claps for your victory, and you are impressed by her sportsmanship. But then she taps her foot behind you a few times, which knocks you out of your chair, so you might have to take that back for now. Then Anita looks down at you and says, “Well, looks like it’s you and me, Ant. May the best player win!” You agree and give her a thumbs up.


Then the last match begins. It’s a sudden death match, so every move will count. You also hope that Anita plays fairly and doesn’t mess with you this time. Although, there really isn’t anything you can do to stop her if she does. It turns out that the final match is on a map that you’re really familiar with so you rush for the best gun. But then, out of nowhere, you hear Anita yawn loudly. You reflexively look back, and freeze in horror. Her right foot, which has consistently ignored your personal space while playing, was barreling right towards you while dragging the ball of her foot on the rug. In an instant, you were grabbed by her stretching toes, and got lifted up into the air. You spend a good 10 seconds in the air as she ruthlessly squeezed you. You were then shuffled from toe to toe, and you got vigorously squeezed by each and every one of her toes. Even her cute little pinky toes gave you some of its love, and you were surprised and excited to know how dominating and powerful even her pinky toe could get. Then she let you go and dragged her foot back to her slipper, content with their brief, but passionate love affair. You looked up, convinced that she was playing dirty again, but she was looking intently at the screen, so she might have done it by accident. But once you got you bearings, you saw Anita blast you with a laser shot. You lose.


And then Leah reached for you with her left foot, and slammed her toes into your little area. You were not expecting Leah to grab you so suddenly, and then the toes started giving you their love, as a way to remind you that her toes loved you just as passionately Anita’s. Then she brought her foot to her lap and dexterously dropped you into her palm. She put you down on top of the table, and you could see Anita cheering for her victory. She was right about being competitive at least, but you still had fun with your titanic friends. Leah then, begrudgingly, proclaimed Anita the Halo champion for the night. You clapped for Anita, and she reached her hand out to give you a high-five. Although you call it a high-five, you ended up actually giving her a high-finger instead, if you were being more accurate.


Then, before Leah said what she had in mind next, Anita interjected with her own idea. She said “You know, I’m feeling kind of tired actually. That game was intense.” She then leans in and brings her head incredibly close to you, causing her massive face to take up your entire view. Then she added “Hey Ant! Why don’t you come back to my place for the night? I’ll bring you back tomorrow. I’ve had a lot of fun with you already. What do you say?” She then gives you a big smile, and Leah looks down at you and smiles. She says “I’d have not objections if you wanted to go with her, Ant. That was why I wanted to invite her over; so you guys can get to know each other better. But if you go, I’d rather make sure I can see you sometime tomorrow. We don’t want to lose you at this size, right Anita?” Anita agreed and looks to you for your answer. What will you do?
0523222111112.title: A Furious Game of Halo

choices: “I was supposed to go to the gym!”
“I’ve got to turn in a project at the library!”
05232221111121.content:
You look up at Anita, and you see her massively grinning face. She then bites her lip, and licks them back and forth, and you feel like you are being entranced. You then look down at her feet, which are shuffling about, as if they are waiting impatiently for their new buddy to make his decision. But you finally make up your mind, although you wonder if you are being mesmerized by Anita’s beauty and intensity, but you decide anyway. You yell up, and say “Can I go back with you Anita? I’d really like to get to know you better! I never knew you were such a cool and amazing person!” Anita blushed and quickly snatches you up, showering you with kisses, and you think you’re gonna be crushed by this incredible woman’s giant lips. Leah, because she was such a nice person, was totally fine with your choice. Anita then said “Oh you’ve made the right decision Ant! You’ll soon see! See you later Leah!” And with that, Anita leaves with you in the palm of her hand. Leah tries to say “Hey! Don’t forget about him Anit—”, but Anita slams the door before Leah was finished. She was worried, but thought she could text her tomorrow morning, just give her a reminder.


Once she closes Leah’s door, she looks at you mischievously and says “Say Ant, I don’t really want to carry you all the way back to my apartment room, so how about we put you inside my slipper? You haven’t experienced them yet, have you little boy?” You nod, and say “Yeah, you’re totally right Anita! That sounds awesome to me! Thanks a bunch!” She smiles and lowers you towards the floor, and slips her right foot out of her right slipper. She slides you in, and you fall at the center of the slipper. You looked around, and you were completely surrounded by Anita’s scent, and it was amazing. It was very strong, and if you didn’t know any better, you’d believe that you were dropped in a humid and foggy swamp, and not someone’s slipper. You wanted to run over to the toe section, and roll about in one of her toe imprints, which you were sure would be big enough to fit multiples of you. You looked up, back at Anita, and seeing her at her full height froze you in a complete sense of awe. You could barely see past her chest, she was so huge. You also realized that she was currently balancing on one leg, and that her right foot was resting on her knee; and you finally noticed that she had a faint blue toe nail polish on. You thought that they were probably faded from wearing these slippers all the time, and you wouldn’t mind helping her get a fresh coat on them at some point. But you noticed that she pulled out her phone, and you wondered if she had similar phone habits as Leah had.


You think back on it, and can remember how whenever Leah got a text message or a phone call, she would wildly play with her shoes. Since she’d always focus on her phone, you were able to take more frequent and lengthier glances at her perfect feet than you’d normally would, because there was no chance of her noticing you. And back then, you thought it was be really awkward if she caught you staring at her feet, so you were always careful about it. It didn’t matter if Leah was wearing her beautiful flip flops, if she was wearing a pair of classy dress flats, or if she was wearing a pair of slippers or moccasins; she would always ruthless play with and dominate them with her amazing feet. You remember one time when she was wearing a pair of ugg boots and she got a phone call. After picking up the phone, and pushed her feet out of the boots, which were bare at the time, and ruthlessly mauled them with her bare feet as much as she could. It was such an amazing sight, and you were glad you got to see it. You hoped that Anita did in fact have the same habit as Leah.


You soon find out that Anita does indeed, play with her shoes even wilder when she’s on the phone. She reaches down to the shoe with her right foot, and grips the back up with her slender toes. She then swings the slipper back and forth, bringing her leg all the way up to her waist and back down. You were amazed by her flexibility and you ability to stay inside the slipper. You look around and realize that the reason why you’re still inside the slipper is because you are almost glued to the sweaty and sticky fluffy material, which reaches up to your knees, and they do not plan on letting you go. Then she slaps the slipper down, while gripping the back with her toes, and the force frees you from your fluffy prison. But then she immediately shoves her foot back into the slipper, and you are grabbed by her 3rd and 4th toes as a result. They begin feeling you, unable to contain their excitement of continuing their passionate love affair from the Halo game, and you feel the same way, hoping that they will treat you affectionately and mercilessly. You started kissing your neighboring toes as much as you could, as a sign to them that you loved them just as much as they loved you, and they seemed to respond in kind. They brutally squeezed you, trying to mash you up into a small ball, and then would rub against you vigorously, in an attempt to give you the most intense and fervorous toe massage you’ve ever experienced. And they succeeded. And the more her toes intensely and affectionately rubbed and played with you, the more and more you tried to kiss and lick every inch you could reach. It was a vicious cycle of passion, her toes continued to increase the intensity of their love until you thought you would burst from satisfaction. Then she puts away her phone, finished with her conversation, and begins walking to her room. You wonder if she had already forgotten about her tiny playmate for the night.


When she gets back home, she removes her slippers, and you remain with her toes for the moment. You begin moving as much as you can, which is not much because of the sweat that glued you to her foot as a result of your intense and passionate love affair, in an attempt to remind her of your existence. Sadly, she had already completely forgotten you, and just thinks she feels a slight itch. She separates her right toes, nearly dislodging you in the process, and then you see her left foot barreling towards you. It seems to be intent on dislodging whatever was bothering Anita, and sadly there was no one around who could remind her that you were that itch, and her left toes dislodge you as they rub her right toe spaces relentlessly. As you fall, you are treated to a breathtaking sight of Anita’s slender toes rubbing against each other. Once you land in her sweaty slipper, you can see how long her legs are, as they stretched over the horizon. She then grabs the slippers and drops them with the rest of her footwear. It seems like you’ll be sleeping alone tonight. So you wander into the toe section and lay down in one of her toe imprints, which gives off an even more overpowering and amazing scent, and quickly fall asleep happily.


In the morning, Anita oversleeps a bit, and gets herself ready in a panic. You wake up to her running around freaking out, and any and all hopes you had of being rediscovered were thrown out the window. She was planning to go somewhere early in the morning, but you couldn’t tell what. But whatever it was, you had a strong feeling that she’d be taking you with her, even if she didn’t intend to. She forgets about you for the moment, and quickly puts on her slippers. You get ensnared by her toes and are stuck in-between her 2nd and 3rd toes on her right foot. She wiggles her toes wildly as she runs around trying to get ready for the day, completely oblivious to her tiny buddy that she invited over to spend the night with. It seems like you’re about to get a front row seat to the unconscious antics of Anita’s wild and affectionate toes. You wondered if they would be lovingly passionate or ruthlessly dominating with you. But either way, you’d have a great time down here, but you hope that Anita remembers you eventually.


She continues to rush around in her apartment, still wearing her slippers, trying to get herself together. And her toes continue to mash and rub into you, as if they were as panicked as their master, Anita, was. You then hear her yell to herself, which confirms to you where she was going, and says:
05232221111121.title: Spending the Night with Anita

choices: Anita decides to go on the treadmill
Anita chooses to do some (light) weight lifting
052322211111211.content:
You hear her yell to herself, “Oh man! Oh man! I was supposed to go to the gym an hour ago! Man I’m running so late!” As she’s worrying, she stomps around her apartment frantically searching for her gym clothing, which repeatedly mashes you into her titanic toes. She runs about, quickly performing all of her morning hygiene duties, sometimes doing two things at once. All throughout this, she does not look down at her slippers, and you get continuously smashed inside her chaotic slipper by her insanely active toes. You try moving around, before the sweat completely immobilized you, in a last ditch attempt to get her to look down. But all you manage out of her is a ruthless and intense stomp, which quickly ends you attempts to be noticed. Maybe it would be best if you waited until she was a bit less stressed out, because right now all you’re managing on doing is inviting more punishment from her. Though, part of you wants to continue to mess with her, hoping she will get more and more relentless with her torture tactics, but you let logic and reason dictate your thoughts for now, and not your passion.


She eventually gets on her shirt and pants, and opens her sock drawer. She then exclaims, “Oh crap! Are none of my socks clean? Screw it; I’ll just grab a dirty pair. I’m just going to the gym after all.” You’re excited that your first experience inside Anita’s socks will be inside ones that will be already dirty and used, and already pre-coated in her natural foot scent. She grabs a pair of long white socks, and you can see the rough patches near the toe section. She sits down on her bed and rests the foot you are attached to on the bed, preparing to put her socks on. You can see her immense figure uncaringly looking towards her feet, and you should up at her, shouting at her for one last attempt at discovery. You seem to get a reaction out of her, but Anita just thought she heard a fly buzz, and ignored your pleas. She quickly pulls the sock on, covering you completely, and wiggles her toes to get a feeling of them. In the process, you were shuffled about madly in there and were forced to get to know every toe space in that immense foot. And the smell was at an entirely different level when compared to when you rode in her fluffy slippers, probably because of how much she used these for working out. You were sure she would work up a lot of sweat soon, and you were looking forward to it.


The she walks over to her trainers, while pushing you deeper and deeper inside her toe spaces, and begins to shove them in. Since she was in a rush, she started grinding the ball of her foot back and forth in an attempt to force them in, which kept you thoroughly disoriented and mashed. Then she tapped down the toes of the shoes, to confirm that they were in all of the way, and you were shaken about. Her tapping also dislodged you from your current toe companions, and you got slammed into all of the others, and ended up ensnared by her 3rd and 4th toes, and they rubbed against you in an attempt to get to know you intimately. She then announces to herself, “Alright, now to get to the gym! I should run there. It would be a nice way to work off that oversleeping I did.” And you wondered how much you would be brutalized by this coming sprint to the gym, but you were confident in Leah’s durability to keep you safe. So you focused you thoughts on how much fun you’d have as you were pulverized during the run, instead.


As she runs, you are continually slammed into the rough shoe material by her thundering toes. You wish that she wore those slippers again, because these were much too hard and tough for your liking. The one positive of her run though, was that her feet sweated bullets, so you were given a healthy serving of sweat to keep you lubricated inside of the shoe. And it was pretty warm out today, so Anita’s shoe quickly got very steamy and humid. You loved the atmosphere that was forming inside this shoe, and you hoped that the temperature would continue to rise, to amplify the sweat and humidity formed inside your shoe abode. And that sweaty coating caused you to get to know every inch of Anita’s massive shoe clad foot, sliding you about as Anita ran. And you were glad you got to experience this amazing tour in one of Anita’s dirty and used socks, which were already covered by her natural odor and scent, which made the experience all the more intense and exhilarating.


You first slid away from the writhing toes that provided you with endless amounts of love and brutality, and got acquainted with her fleshy, sweat covered, sole. After you stopped there, you were slowly engulfed by her sweaty flesh. Anita felt you, or rather something, poking her in there, and started grinding her foot to get rid of the annoyance. The grinding only served to shove you deeper and deeper into her flesh, and it eventually dislodged you from there and you slid to your next destination. She then went back to her run and you continued your shoe tour. Next, you found yourself under the ball of her foot, and it pressed you into its sweaty folds next. You wound up wedged in one of her larger folds, and it was very sweaty and hot, and you remained there for a good few minutes. As you were there, you couldn’t move a muscle, and every time her foot impacted the ground, the folds seemed to tighten, which crammed you even more inside. And then, you finally end up back among your favorite toes, and they beginning squeezing you as Anita runs, as if they were giving you a welcome back hug. And your tour of the rest of Anita’s foot made you appreciate your loving and sweaty playmates even more. As Anita continues to run, her toes continue to give you a very loving and vigorous rub down, covering you with more and more layers of hot foot sweat. The best part was that Anita was not even trying to pleasure you in the slightest, but you had a feeling that she would have dropped you in her socks as she ran and worked out, even if she did remember you, based on how mischievous and playful she was last night.


Eventually, Anita makes it to the gym, and thinks about what she should do for her workout session. She thought that an hour on the treadmill could do her some good. But she could also do some light weight lifting at one of the machines instead. No matter what Anita chose, you would be given your own personal workout from your neighboring toes. And as she thought, she could swear that she felt a tiny pebble in her sock, and she messed with it a bit with her toes to confirm her suspicions, and you were once again treated to a ruthless series of prodding by Anita’s sweaty toes. But she was confident that it’d go away after working out for while.
052322211111211.title: Time to Workout!

choices: Anita checks her phone, and sees a text from Leah
Anita focuses on the pebble, crushing it before checking her phone
052322211111212.content:
Anita yells “Oh no! I needed to turn in that project for work today! Why did they want me to do this on a weekend?!” When she asked that to herself, she stomped her foot, as if her foot expected you to answer for it. She runs about, quickly performing all of her morning hygiene things, sometimes doing two things at once. She then ran to her closet and looked for what she could wear today. She needed to look nice and professional, so she grabbed a blouse shirt and dress slacks. She looked at her favored flats, and decided against them. She bought a really nice pair of leather boots the other day, and they’d look great with her outfit. She grabs them and says “These are some real nice boots. I haven’t broken the in yet, so now is the best time to do it. There’s no time like the present!” You are a bit worried now, because if they were as new as she claimed, then you would get brutally attacked while you were in there. But you were confident in your current durability, so you look at this as another chance to experience Anita at her most aggressive and ruthless.


She grabs a short red sock, and slips her foot out of her slipper, and you see that she’s dressed really professionally. You think she looks gorgeous right now, and that her thick rimmed glasses really look good on her, and really match her outfit. You try and shout to Anita that you’re down amongst her toes, but you’re too stuck to move about enough, so she doesn’t notice you. She does hear a faint buzzing noise, but she assumes it’s just a fly, and disregards that too. Then she pulls the sock over her foot tightly, stifling any chance you had of discovery. You were snugly positioned in-between the toes that you loved so much, and you eagerly await their entrance into those leather boots. She shoves her feet inside, uncaringly, and ties them up tightly. She immediately moves her foot about and wildly wiggles and scrunches her toes, trying to harshly break in the boots. You were relentlessly and continually smashed into each of her toes, and the smell quickly grew. With the red sock covering up her active foot, it kept all of the sweat and stench inside, almost like a layer of insulation. And you were very happy that you got to experience all of the sweat and smell, from your front row seat inside the sock, in-between her toes.


Anita then prepares to go to the library, thoroughly squeezing and mashing you with her restless toes, and walks down to her car. Once she gets there, she speeds to the library. The university library was a fairly short distance, so she would be able to make it soon, as long as she didn’t hit any traffic. In the back of her mind, she was convinced that she forgot something, but she had her project next to her, so it must have been nothing. Since you were attached to her right foot, you got healthy helpings of Anita’s toe flesh as she stepped on the gas. She was a fairly calm driver, so you weren’t stomped too hard, which was always nice. You could always use a break or two while going on these passionate adventures, with these crazily awesome titans that you call your friends. But then, the car in front of Anita stops suddenly, and Anita slams her foot on the break, stopping just in time.
