Anita’s breaking crammed you harshly into her toe flesh, and it was strong enough to almost make you pop, even with your durability. She curses to herself, and you do too because that was just too close, and she scrunches her toes in frustration. You then can feel her toes come back for another round with you, and you could tell that they would not be gentle this time. They roughly grab at you, and dominate you while shoving you into their sweaty toe spaces. You really love how fickle Anita’s toes could be, going from lovingly sensual and angrily domineering at the drop of a hat.


When Anita reaches the library, she rushes in to drop off her project. She runs into her little office and starts looking through her binder, to make one final revision before submitting it. While she combs through her project meticulously up above, her toes wildly wriggle about in their new leather abode. You are roughly handled by the angry toes, and you think that they’re trying to take their frustration out on you because of being stuck in this tough leather boot. You try and rub them back, in an attempt to soothe their rage, but all it does is provide further stimulus for Anita’s unconscious mind. Your rubbing caused Anita to rub you back even harder, and she starts to believe that you are some small pebble, and not her friend that she was so entranced by last night.


You hear her yell down to her boot, and she says “Geez this pebble is getting on my nerves! I’ve got a big project to finalize. I can’t have some stupid thing bother me so much. I’m gonna grind you to dust, you annoying piece of junk!” You realize that you will get to experience Anita’s ruthless and brutal side for the time being, and you’re looking forward to what kind of punishment she will put you through. She stomps her right foot down hard, knocking the wind out of you, and says “This is exactly what you deserve for getting in my boot! I’m gonna teach you why it’s a bad idea to bother a woman when she’s busy!” You’re more shocked than anything that she thinks a pebble has so much free will, as if they’re anything but inanimate objects. You also hope that she makes the connection that this ‘pebble’ that she so desperately wants to destroy might not be a simple pebble after all, but you don’t get your hopes up. Maybe Leah will send her a text to remind her about you, to save you from Anita’s fury.


Then Anita prepares to go to town on this pebble, and completely pulverize it. She starts by slamming her foot down, dislodging you from your neighboring toes. You land on the leather material in the toe section, and all 5 of Anita’s angry and monumental toes are flexed up towards the top of the toe section. You begin running towards her pinky toe, knowing that if you can find refuge with it, then you won’t suffer too much damage from her toe tantrum. But, almost as if they sensed your movement, all of her toes immediately slam down, and you are pinned by her 3rd toe. It crushes you before attempting to drag you to her larger toes, and you knew that your final destination was her big toe. You were sure that, regardless of your current durability, you wouldn’t last long against that beast of a digit. So you slip away just as you pass the 2nd toe as it tried to pass you off to its big brother. You make the run back, dodging her 2nd toe, but her 3rd toe slams back into you. This process repeats a few times, and you never get past her 3rd toe, and you know that you’re running out of energy. And Anita seems to be getting rougher and rougher with each attempt. You know that this might be your last chance, and you hope for a miracle. Because if not, then your adventure might just come to an end.


And it was around now that Leah was getting worried at the apartment. She went to Anita’s place, to check on you guys, and realized that she already left to go somewhere. She knows that her friend could get pretty forgetful, and she had a bad feeling that Ant was forgotten by her at some point between last night, when Anita left, and right now. She decides to send her friend a short text message, to remind her of her tiny friend and companion. She writes “Hey Anita! Don’t forget about Ant, alright! You’ve got to keep him safe!” Leah hopes that she will see the text message immediately, so she can be sure that Ant will not be in any danger. Leah briefly considers calling her friend instead, but she changes her mind, because she doubts it will be too urgent. What’s the worst that could happen?


But then, you hear a cell phone message tone, and you’re sure that it was Anita’s. This might be that chance you had hoped for! You hope and pray that Anita checks it, giving you a chance to reach your sanctuary near her pinky toe. Because you know if you fail, then your journey will end painfully, smothered by Anita cruelly. Anita hears her phone, but considers ignoring it for the moment. That pebble was really slippery, but she was starting to get a good grasp of it, and she was sure that she could get it with one more try. Her plan was to pin it down, then shuffle it under her big toe, and then finally get rid of it permanently. And then she’d finally be distraction free, so she could revise her project in peace. But she also had an odd sense of dread all of a sudden, and she couldn’t explain why. Maybe she should check her phone, just in case.
052322211111212.title: Working on a Weekend?!

choices: Go inside Anita’s boot, and provide support to her toes
Hide on the podium, and provide some moral support
0523222111112121.content:
Anita pins you down under her 3rd toe burying your face in her toe flesh, and pushes down hard enough so you cannot move, but she doesn’t move you yet. The toe does begin to rub your tiny body up and down thoroughly, and it felt much gentler than she had been before, almost like a full body massage. It slowly and sensually moves up your entire body, making sure that every inch of you was rubbed lovingly by the toe. It turns out that Anita decides to check her phone really quick, distracting her momentarily from her targeted ‘pebble’, and sees a message from Leah saying: “Hey Anita! Don’t forget about Ant, alright! You’ve got to keep him safe!” It causes Anita to remember about her tiny friend, and she has the following thought process:


First, she fully remembers that she got you to go back with her last night. She then wonders about the last time she saw you, realizing that she never went to bed with you or saw you go to bed. Then her mind returns to the pebble that had been bothering her recently, and wiggles her toes while thinking, moving you about. She looks down at the boot, and it finally clicks that the ‘pebble’ that she was treating so terribly must have actually been you! Anita scrambles to remove her boot, in an attempt to rescue you from her mistake, hoping that you were okay.


She unties the boot and removes her socked foot, and she takes the boot to shake it out, seeing that you were not inside of there. She then looks at her sock and lifts her socked foot up to her lap, and pulls it off quickly, and shakes it about to empty its contents. She does not see you because you are still stuck to her toes, and she looks there next, realizing where you must have been. Anita finally separates her toes, and scans them thoroughly, and she eventually sees you weakly smiling at her. She gently peels you away from her toe and carefully brings you to her face. You can tell from her face that she is heartbroken, and it eases your mind knowing that she truly didn’t mean to treat you the way she did while you were inside her boot, so you decide to make sure that Anita doesn’t feel at fault for this, and to make her know that you forgive her.


Anita holds you close to her face, and you can see tears welling up inside her, and she begins to speak to you, softly but exasperatedly. She says “Oh my god, Ant! I can’t believe what I was doing while you were in there. I can’t begin to tell you how sorry I am for forgetting you and subjecting you to this kind of torture. I’d understand if you’d rather me not watch over you anymore, given how irresponsible I was today and last night. I can only hope that this won’t impact our friendship.” You smile up to Anita, completely understanding that she did not mean any of what she had done to you throughout the day, but you do have some judgments on her responsibility however, but you don’t really worry about that right now. You motion to her that you’d like to respond, and she brings you up to her ear, so you don’t need to strain your voice. You say, in a very exhausted tone, “I forgive you Anita. You didn’t mean to do these things to me, so I’m still okay with spending time with you.”You pause before continuing and say “But maybe next time, you can try and remember the person you invite back to your room?” She giggles at what you say, and it seems to succeed in brightening her spirits, at least somewhat. “You know what Ant? You might just be right.” You both laugh a little bit; putting that rough experience behind the both of you, and Anita brings you back down.


She says “Let me set you up a small area so you can rest. I still have a few hours left in my shift, so you can take a nap at my desk.” She then rummages through her desk and pulls out a soft cloth, and folds it about until it’s the size of a small bed for you. Before putting you down, Anita leans in towards you, and gives you a very light and gentle kiss. Her lips softly hug you, and you feel happy that you’re being cared for by a loving, if forgetful, giantess. Then she places you on the cloth bedding, and it is very soft and relaxing, and you quickly fall into a deep sleep, recovering from the experience. While you rest, Anita looks down at you with a relieved but still guilt filled face, as she still feels terrible because of what she did.


After about an hour, you slowly wake up, feeling much better than you did earlier. You’re surprised that you feel better so soon, and you make a mental note to ask Leah about it when you next see her, and you begin looking up at Anita. She is very focused on her work, most likely expecting you to be out for a good while longer, so you begin to look over her as she works. You see how beautiful she looked at your angle, and her eyes were incredibly focused on her work. You were also amazed by how large she appeared right now, where you thought that one of her glasses lenses could easily cover your tiny body. She also paged through her large binder, and her razor sharp focus impressed you greatly, understanding how she can really hone in on one or two things intently, even if she was pretty forgetful at times. And seeing how focused she currently was, you thanked the heavens that Anita read that text message when she did, otherwise; you didn’t really want to think about what could have happened. And because she was at work, she was wearing some makeup, and you thought that it made her look truly stunning, and it made you glad that you could call her your friend.


After watching Anita for a little bit, you were beginning to get restless, so you got up so you could chat with Anita for a bit. You hope that she would be able to talk with you for a little bit, realizing how busy she looked right now. You see that her left hand was on the table not moving, so you walk up and rub one of her fingers, but it causes her to reflexively pin you down before looking to see what she felt. She gasps and picks you up instead, and she asks you “Why are you up so soon, Ant? Are you already feeling better?” You reply “Yep! I feel great! But I was also feeling a bit bored down there, so I hoped that you weren’t too busy to chat for a bit. What were you working on?” Anita’s face lights up, eager to share her research project with her tiny friend, and says “I’m working on a project gauging the effectiveness of college libraries for student achievement on the college level! I’m looking at a bunch of different university libraries, seeing what kinds of services they provide, and then looking at their test scores and stuff like that. I’ve been working on this for a few months now, and I’m pretty proud of it myself!” Anita goes on, describing different aspects of her study and her methodology, and you barely understood half of it, but you still enjoyed talking, or rather listening, to her. The way her face shined and beamed when she talked about something that impassioned her really makes her seem even more amazing and beautiful.


But after talking for awhile, you could hear someone walking towards Anita’s desk, and she suddenly grabs you in her hand, as if she was hiding you. A serious sounding man begins speaking to Anita, and she responds back to him professionally, while squeezing you in her hand. It wasn’t all that hard, but you could tell that she was doing this because she felt nervous, because you could feel her palms get a little sweaty. Eventually the guy leaves, and Anita quickly opens her palm back up, and apologizes. She says “Sorry about that! That was my boss, and I didn’t want him to discover you, and I probably would have gotten in trouble if he found out a brought a friend to work; even if you are so tiny.” Anita gives a light chuckle after saying that, and you thought that she’d never get tired of making size jokes around you. You don’t mind, and ask her about what he talked to you about, saying “It’s cool Anita. So what was he talking to you about?” She responds and says “My boss wants be to present my findings to a library research group. I’m a little nervous about doing it, but it would be a big step for me.” So you ask her “Is there anything I could do to help out? I couldn’t sit back here while you were nervously presenting something!” Anita’s eyes lit up, and you could tell that she did have an idea on how you could help her.


She says “Well… I do think there is one way that you could help me out. I’d be a lot less nervous if you came with me while I presented!” You were fine with this, but were a bit confused, so you asked “Wait, where would you want me to be? Didn’t you say that I shouldn’t be discovered by your boss?” Anita giggles and responds “Yup, I sure did say that! But I think that you could still be of help, but still not be found by my boss or any other staff members. If you’d go inside my boot while I gave the presentation, I could play around with you like a stress ball, so I could focus on my presentation. I know that these boots weren’t great for you before, but this time will be different! And I’d be so glad if you decided to go back inside my boots. You can’t imagine how much of a happy girl you’d make me, Ant!” You try and stop yourself from swooning over her sweet and seductive words and promises, as you’re not entirely convinced, so you wait until she finishes with her ideas. Anita continues, and says “So, if you’d rather not go back inside my scary boot, I could always hide you somewhere on the podium, so I could see you provide me your moral support. I’d greatly appreciate either one, Ant!” So you think things over, and you really want to help out Anita, but you’re a bit unsure of what you should do. The boot idea would be fun, but you wonder if you’re recovered enough to handle another round inside Anita’s leathery and unbroken-in boots. You know from experience that it will be a passionate, but also relentless, roller coaster ride in there. So you eventually choose to:
0523222111112121.title: Salvation from Anita’s Mad Boot Ride

choices: You decide to sleep in one of Leah’s softer shoes
You decide to sleep in Leah’s sock, as she wears it
05232221111122.content:
You think things through, and you believe that you have reached a consensus. You did think that Anita was highly attractive, playful, nice, and fun, and not to mention how crazy she got with her feet and toes, but you think that she might be a tad too forgetful for you. After all, it did not take her very long to forget about your presence during the Halo game, so it might not be the best plan. Plus, Leah was the one who organized all of this for you, and without her none of this could ever happen, so you feel obligated to stick with her. You yell up, “Sorry Anita, but I think I’d rather stay here for the night! But I’d love to spend more time with you over the weekend! I’m glad I got to get to know you today! You’re such a nice and beautiful person, Anita!” Anita made a light pout and leaned in towards you, and you weren’t too sure what she planned to do, as you knew she could be gentle and mischievous. But you braced yourself either way.


Anita leans in and give you a light kiss, and it feels like your body is being sucked into her huge mouth, and her tongue runs up and down your body, but she ends it fairly quickly. She smiles down at you and says “You’re such a flatterer Ant! I’d love to spend more time with you.” Her face then shifts into a coy smirk, and she adds “Maybe next time you can come back with me? I promise that I can be just as fun, too. We’ll have the time of your life, my sweet little boy!” She then begins to giggle, before heading for the door. Then she says, “Bye Leah! Bye Ant! Have a nice night!” and then she leaves for the night. She said that last thing very suggestively, and you tried to ignore it while Leah laughed.


Leah asks you if you’d like to get yourself washed off, and you look at yourself briefly, before telling her that you would. So she takes you to the bathroom, and messes with her sink until it acts like a mini shower for you. She also grows you until you are around 3 inches again, and she leaves you to wash yourself off. As you relax under this hot shower, you think back on the day you’ve had, trying to make sense of it all. Most of it felt too surreal for you, and you would not be surprised if you dreamed this all up, although you hoped that it was indeed real. You also think about Leah and Anita, and how awesome they were and how they treated you so far, and you wondered what you should do once this whole experience would end. Would it not be awkward to talk with these two girls after this was all over, after all the crazy things they did with you while you were their helpless little boy toy. You think you will ask Leah about this after you get cleaned off, because you don’t want it hanging over you as the weekend progressed.


Then Leah comes back into the bathroom, dressed in some beautiful pajamas. They were a light blue and looked both comfortable and pretty, and you thought they were made out of silk. You also notice that these pajamas showed off Leah’s midriff, and it made her look even better. You also saw that she was wearing her own pair of slippers, and they were a really nice green color. Leah then looks down at you, content that you were finished cleaning yourself and were now prepared for bed, and she gives you a loving and sweet smile. You feel yourself getting shorter again, obviously because of Leah, and you stop once you return to your 1/3 of an inch height. She says, “How about we go over to my bed, and lie down for a little bit.” She then tosses you over to her pillow, and you land with a bounce, and you look up to Leah standing over her bed. She grins at you slyly, and you’ve got a feeling that she’s up to something. Then she jumps onto the bed too, and her impact sends you up and into her body. You land right on her bare belly, which is shown through her midriff, as she lies down, and you can’t even see her face past her huge breasts, and you look back the other way and see the vast expanse of Leah’s long legs. You crawl about, trying to get your bearings, and it causes Leah to giggle profusely, which continues to knock you over because of her stomach vibrations. She yells, “Stop crawling around like a bug down there Ant! I’m ticklish around my belly!” She then props herself up a bit more on her bed, which sends you tumbling towards her private area, and you land right on top of it. You are very embarrassed, and your face is as red as a tomato, and Leah just starts laughing louder.


She yells down to you, “Man Ant, didn’t know you had such a pervy side!” and then pushes you away from her nether region, and you land in front of Leah’s slipper covered feet. You look up at her and begin to apologize, before Leah says “I’m just joking around Ant! I know you weren’t trying to land there. It was just too funny to resist teasing you!” You then give her a playfully annoyed look, and she then says “Oh, did you just volunteer to be my personal foot massager for the night? I’d expect you to work through the night if that were the case.” Your face immediately changes, as even though nothing would please you more than to massage Leah’s perfect feet at this size thoroughly and completely, you were simply too drained to do so tonight. She then says “That’s what I thought!” before sticking her tongue at you, loving the teasing she was doing.


She then takes a deep breath, and calms herself down, before beginning to speak. She says, “Say Ant. Have you had a nice time so far? Was this everything you wanted? I hope you enjoyed Anita’s company too. Just for the record, I had a great time tonight.” You felt a bit bombarded by all of these questions, but you try to answer them as truthfully as you can. You respond by saying, “I had the time of my life tonight. I feel like I’m dreaming right now, because you’ve been so great to me. I don’t think I’ve felt this much excitement or pleasure ever in my life. Sometimes I still can’t believe that I’m less than an inch tall and at the mercy of such a gorgeous and incredible person! And it was really fun to get to know Anita too! I’m glad that you thought to invite her, because she’s also a really awesome and beautiful person.” Leah smiles, and you don’t realize how happy you’ve made her by your answer, but you continue with a question. You ask, “But Leah, I do have a question. What happens after this is all over, and we go back to our normal lives? Won’t it feel weird to hang out after everything that has, and will, happen this weekend?”


Leah looks down at you with a serious but empathetic face. She takes a few moments to think of what to say to you, so it is both honest and calms your apprehensions about the future. Leah finally answers, saying “You know Ant, you’ve got a point. It might feel weird to interact after what we do this weekend. But who says that it needs to end after this weekend, permanently? We could always do this again anther day, or afternoon, or weekend, or even week if we get the chance. I’d enjoy making this some sort of tradition between us. It’ll be our secret!” Your eyes light up for a moment and you think that you’d do anything to be able to continue to do this kind of thing into the future, but then another question comes into your head: how Leah can shrink and grow things. You then say “I’d love to be able to do this again, whenever we have the chance, but I just thought of something. How are you able to shrink and grow stuff, Leah?” Leah’s face grows a bit darker, as she doesn’t have nearly as many answers as you would like, and definitely not enough for herself either.


Leah says “To tell the truth Ant, I’m not so sure myself. I woke up one day and thought that I lost my toothbrush. I looked all over for it before finding it right in its case, only it was 1/10 of its natural size. I do know that I can’t grow things past their natural size. I can only shrink things and grow them back. And about the durability thing I told you about?” You nod, knowing all too well how handy it was for your fun tonight, as without it you were sure that you would have died countless times already. Leah continues with “Well honestly, I didn’t technically do that, at least not as its own, separate, thing. I found out that the things I shrink increase in durability, in relation to how much they shrink from their original size, so that’s why you are so durable.” You are satisfied with Leah’s answer, even though you’d like to know more of the specifics about it, but based on Leah’s current demeanor and face as she described it, she was in the same boat as you.


Then Leah makes a loud yawn, and you also realize how tired you were and how late it was. You guys talked for so long that neither of you realized that it was past 2 AM! Leah looks down at you and says “Wow we stayed up late! But I loved our conversation. You’re really such a great guy Ant, and I’m glad I can do all of this with you.” You blush, knowing that you felt the same, that you were so happy to spend this experience with the goddess who you call your good friend. She then adds “Well, we should figure out your sleeping arrangements real quick. I can leave you in one of my softer shoes, like my moccasin or my slipper, and you can sleep in there. I can even leave a well worn sock for you as an added source of warmth. I know that you’ll love that! But, I can always leave you in my sock for the night while I wear it. It is pretty cold, and I’m sure the both of us would love to share body heat, even if the trade might not be so equal!” She giggles, and you begin thinking. You weigh you options, and both sound great to you, so you could easily go with either one.
05232221111122.title: A Peaceful Night with Leah

choices: Going to help a friend move
Meet up with her old friend, Neha, for coffee
052322211111222.content:
You look up at Leah’s smiling face, and that perfect face fills your entire view, and you think you’ve come to a decision. You say, “Can I go into one of your socks? I can’t bare not spending the night with you, Leah!” Leah groans before laughing, and says “Geez that was bad, Ant! But, you’re a really good flatterer, you know that? Ignoring the bad puns of course! But thank you so much, I really appreciate the sweet words, little buddy.” You smile, happy with the knowledge that you made such a great girl happy. And happy that you were able to come up with such a great pun on the spot like that, especially one so relevant. Leah gets up, with you still in her palm, and walks towards her dresser.


So Leah goes and grabs a fresh long green sock, and you’re looking forward to your night with such an amazing set of toes. Leah looks down at you and giggles, saying “Man Ant, you’re really excited, aren’t you!” She then starts rubbing you with her pinky finger, tickling you relentlessly, and you futilely attempt to push it away, and says “You can’t even stand up to my pinky, Ant? Wow you’re a little wimp!” She then giggles some more, and you know that she’s endlessly enjoying the teasing. After she feels that her pinky has roughed you up enough, she shakes the green sock, ready to drop you right inside. Without another word of warning, she drops you in the right green sock, and you tumble down into the toe section. You look back up at her, and her face seems so far away from you right now, which reminded you of how you felt being put inside her sock earlier today. She peers down into the sock, and says “Aww! Sorry Ant! Didn’t know that you weren’t ready. Whoopsies!” You ignore her incessant teasing, because you’re more interested in spending some quality time with Leah’s gigantic and loving toes.


Leah walks over the bed and wishes you a good night and blows you a kiss, before tossing the sock onto the bed unceremoniously, and you land with a thud. Before you’re able to recover, she plops down onto the bed uncaringly, allowing her butt to slam into the bed, and the impact causes you be bounced up. And once again you are disoriented, and while you’re still seeing stars, she carelessly swings the sock towards her legs, and you know that the real fun is about to begin. She, without acknowledging your presence, begins putting on the right green sock. You can hear, and feel, the foot work its way through the long part of the sock, and it shakes you constantly, and your eyes widen once you see her magnificent toes come into view. They are incredibly large, and they continue to wriggle as they push their way inside. Once it gets in all the way, and you are pinned against the ball of her foot, and she then tugs against the sock tightly, shoving you deeper and deeper into her foot flesh. She quickly rubs her sock covered foot against the carpet, and you get dislodged and are sent toward her excited toes. You wind up in-between her 3rd and 4th toes, and you couldn’t be happier, and they give you a welcoming squeeze.


Leah casually swings her legs up onto the bed, and worms them under her heavy covers, and quickly gets in a comfortable position, ready to fall asleep. While Leah slowly falls asleep, you cannot resist the chance to see how Leah’s toes treat you in this half conscious state. You start rubbing her 4th toe with both of your hands, wondering what kind of reaction you’ll get out of her. You hear a subtle moan come from Leah, and fail to notice her 3rd toe barreling toward the 4th toe that you’re stimulating, and her 3rd toe rubs up and down against you and the 4th toe, as if you were just an itch meant to be scratched away. After things quiet down, you next decide to rub the sweaty space in-between her 3rd and 4th toes, and you remove a few tiny bits of dirt and grime that have collected in the smelly space. You think that Leah should thank you for giving her such a thorough toe cleaning service, but before you can react, both toes shove you deep into the space that you were so kindly cleaning out. You get your face shoved deeply into the dirty and sweaty space, and you think you can hear her moan again, although you can’t be certain with your entire head being engulfed by her sweaty toe flesh. Then you start licking the space that your head is being crammed into, and it caused Leah to push you even harder into the sticky space.


After the toes are satisfied with their treatment of you, you work your way to the space in-between her 2nd and 3rd toes, ready to slumber. You choose this as your resting point because there is a bit more space here, and the heat emanating from these two toes will keep you adequately warmed up. You give each of your immense neighbors a goodnight hug and kiss, and the toes seem to react by wiggling playfully, wanting to give you just as much love as you gave them. They then squeeze again, shoving you deep within their toe space, and you love being shoved deeply into these smelly spaces. This time though, Leah’s toes don’t let up, but you’re content being crammed inside of this sweaty space, because Leah’s skin was so soft and amazing, that you couldn’t think of a better way to spend the night.


A few hours later, Leah starts to vividly dream of dominating Ant while he is in his tiny state. In this dream, Leah treats Ant ruthlessly and wears him in many different types of footwear and does many different things with him while he’s inside her socks and shoes, covering him in mountains of foot sweat in the process. Of course Leah would never be this harsh with Ant in real life, but dreams frequently dig up their baser or hormonal urges. And as Leah dreams of dominating Ant in crueler and crueler ways, her toes are getting incredibly rowdy and excited.


So Leah’s 2nd and 3rd toes suddenly unclench, sending you up with her 3rd toe, as you were more stuck to that one than her 2nd toe. The sudden change wakes you up, and you are shocked to see her 2nd toe barreling toward you without a hint of hesitation. Leah relentlessly grinds you in-between her 2nd and 3rd toes, and you felt like they were trying to pulverize you. You could hear her say to herself, obviously still asleep, “The only fate for something as small and pathetic as you, is to be ground to dust by my beautiful toes.” You’re very excited, but you’re also taken completely aback by this side of Leah, and you hope that you’ll survive her wild dream. She then dexterously shuffles you until you’re on the top of the ball of her foot, and you look up to see all 5 of her titanic digits raised up above you. You smile and plead, most likely on deaf ears, and say “Please, be gentle…” But in an instant, all 5 of her toes slam into the ball of her foot, pressing you harshly into her foot flesh. You hear her mumble “You deserve to be smothered by my toes, you helpless little speck.” You try and fight back, hoping that the stimulus ends her dominating dream, but it only causes her to curl her toes over you and drag you back to them. You end up in-between her 3rd and 4th toes, and they ruthlessly squeeze you in an insane vice, and you wonder if you can survive. She then moans, “I love how you feel when you squirm down there, Ant! Continue to pleasure your master, bug!” You’re getting more and more worried by her current behavior, because you were reaching the end of what you could handle.


But things seem to calm down, probably because she’s started dreaming of something else, and finally says softly and sweetly “Oh Ant! You’re my perfect little bug. I hope our secret fun will never end.” You blush, because of how stunned you are by how she thinks of you deep down. And truth be told, you feel the same way. As Leah settles back down, so do you, and you worm your way back in-between her 2nd and 3rd toes, perfectly aware of how little mercy they just showed you. But you can’t think of a better place to sleep, so you fall back asleep, exhausted by Leah’s late night passionate, and domineering, love affair with you. And almost on cue, Leah scrunches her toes again, shoving you deep within the space that you’ve grown to love so much, and you give it a goodnight kiss. With that kiss, you can hear Leah moan again quietly, and you quietly fall asleep, with your face shoved deep into her sticky and smelly foot flesh, but you wouldn’t have it any other way.


You are awoken by a loud alarm, and Leah quickly jumps out of bed, slamming her feet down on the carpet. You are mashed by her toe flesh, and are completely smothered in its sweaty and sticky morning embrace. You hear her curse to herself, saying that she must have overslept. She starts running around the room, trying to do her hair and brush her teeth at the same time. You attempt to get Leah’s attention, but you realize that you have been crammed so deep inside the space in-between her toes, that you cannot move a single muscle. You can only hope that Leah remembers her tiny little friend that she brought back to her apartment last night. But the way that she was running around, you doubt that she’ll remember a tiny little speck mashed deep in-between her toes on her own. And since she shrunk all of your belongings before bringing you here, there would be no obvious visual reminders for her either! As she runs around, you can hear her, obviously annoyed, mumbling to herself, and you eventually piece together where she was going. Leah was:
052322211111222.title: A Wild Night Inside Leah’s Sock

choices: You swing into the other fold in Leah’s foot, remaining safe
You fail and fall into the flat, stuck at the mercy of the unaware Neha
0523222111112222.content:
**Info for quick reference**
Name: Neha Kher
Age: 26
Evil (out of 10): 2.75
Height: 5’9
Hair Color: Dark Brown


You hear Leah shout, after checking her phone, “Oh no! I’m supposed to meet up with Neha today for coffee!” You wonder who that is, as you’ve never heard that name before, but it is difficult for you to concentrate while Leah stomps around her apartment, crushing you repeatedly. Leah shuffles through her clothing, quickly deciding on what she should wear. She finally decides on a cute blouse and skirt, and also pulls out her pair of green flats. Leah removes her pajamas and quickly gets on her clothes, leaving her socks on for now. Because you are crammed in so tight in Leah’s toe space, you can’t see anything that’s going on, so you’re very much out of the loop right now.


But then you hear the clacking of a pair of flats being dropped on the floor, and it gives you a better picture of what is going on, and Leah quickly removes the sock on her right foot. Very quickly, you can see that Leah is dressed ready to go out, and you think that she looks beautiful right now. You try and make your presence known, but you are still crammed too deep within Leah’s toes, and when you try to shout up to her and she quickly scrunches up her toes, completely covering and muffling your cries for salvation. And then Leah shuffles her bare feet inside of her flats, and grabs her purse before leaving her apartment, and each step pushes your face into her sticky toe space, giving you a face-full of her sweaty flesh. You actually try and lick the spaces when your face gets shoved them, and Leah responds by grinding the ball of her foot harshly, thinking that you are just a subconscious nuisance. The grinding actually dislodges you, and sends you inside one of the larger folds along the ball of her foot, and you are crammed in there until you know that you are completely stuck. Luckily, this position practically absorbed all of the force from Leah’s walking, so you’d be okay for the time being.


Neha is good friends with Leah. They are old buddies back from when they both worked at a sandwich shop in college. They like to meet up at least every other week, so they can catch up. Neha is currently working as an assistant for a local law firm. She’s attending law school so she can reliably move up in the legal world; and she feels prepared because she double majored in business and political science. She’s a sweet person to anyone she meets, but she has been known to pull her fair share of pranks and jokes before. Neha has light brown skin with a few freckles. She’s a pretty slender person, although she is still curvy enough for her own liking. She also has piercing turquoise eyes, and she is frequently complemented on them. She decided to wear a turquoise dress and a pair of tan flats, without any socks. She also wears beautiful turquoise earrings, which she received from her mother years ago, and she wears them all the time. She finds that the dress really matches her eyes, so she keeps a few different variations of turquoise colored dresses for these kinds of occasions.


As Leah nears the café, Neha waves and yells “Hey Leah!! Over here!” Leah runs over to where Neha was sitting and says “Long time, no see Neha! How’ve you been?”She sits down across from Neha, and quickly crosses her legs. As they sit and chat, Leah slowly dangles her flat until it falls onto the ground under their table. Once it falls, you have a slightly better view, at least of things level with Leah’s crossed right foot. You can see a pair of tan feet close to where your foot residence currently is, and you can assume that they belong to this Neha character that Leah mentioned earlier. They look fairly large, although it’s hard to get a good understanding of size when everything looks incredibly large to you right now. Neha quickly removes her feet from their tan flats, cracks and wiggles her long toes, and then drags her feet close to her chair. Leah starts absent-mindedly reaching her right foot down towards Neha’s discarded flats, and you quickly have a bad feeling about this. Leah’s foot is now resting very close to Neha’s right flat, and you could easily fall into it if you slipped from the fold that was currently claiming you right now.


But it was fairly warm by now, so Leah’s foot began to sweat a little bit, covering you with a fresh coat of lubricating foot sweat. You were worried, because you were beginning to slip, and if things continue like this, then you’d fall right into this stranger’s flat. And the last thing you wanted to do was to be at the feet of someone who you didn’t even know! And besides, Leah was the only one who knew about you and your current size situation (and Anita to be fair; but she’s not around right now). And she was the only one who could change your size, so you need to stay with Leah!


As you continue to slip, you notice another, slightly smaller fold along the ball of her foot. If you’re nimble, you could swing into it right as you become dislodged, and then you’d be secured within Leah’s foot for the time being. And since this one is smaller, you can cram yourself even deeper, ensuring your safety. But it would be tricky to get in there in one shot, but you had to try. And you can see Neha’s feet slowly return to her flats, her toes wiggling and cracking playfully, as if they can tell that you could be theirs for the taking. But if you failed, then you’d be at the mercy of this Neha and her light brown feet. And from what you saw already, you doubt that these toes would treat you with any mercy or dignity.
0523222111112222.title: A Coffee Date with an Unaware Foot

choices: “Have a good one Anita! Come over in the morning, okay!”
“Hey, don’t leave just yet. I need to show you something.”
052322211112.content:
You think about how crazy Anita’s legs and feet were while she was chatting to Leah, and you’re really tempted to go in her slippers without her knowledge. You look up at Leah, and you shout “I’ve made up my mind, Leah! Can you get me in Anita’s slippers?” Leah chuckles and says to you “Oh I had a feeling you’d ask that! "You want to stay with me, huh?" Lex interrupts, as if reading your thoughts.
"Wh- how did you...!?" you stutter in partial disbelief.
"Come on, it's written all over your face!" she laughs. "And who wouldn't want to?"
"I guess..." you reply uneasily.
1213221111121221222121212121211222112212.title: Tell her you'd rather stay with her.

choices: "How about we go to the mall and freak people out."
"We should go and prank my friend, she'll love you."
1213221111121221222121212121211222112212.content:
"Sure Ant, why not?" Lex says. "We can make the best your, er, condition, right? It doesn't have to be miserable just because you're, like, a half an inch tall," she said with a warm smile. The truth was sound, and you were craving a nice dose of hope for a while now.
"I'll make sure Danielle keeps her distance from you, so you won't have to worry about her," the blonde explains, setting you down on the kitchen table. You felt the relaxation of her fingers as they released you, and you actually felt free.

"I don't know about you, but I'm pretty hungry. Care for some granola bar? I'm kind of a health nut lately, but you can have whatever you'd like," the giantess offers, pulling out a box of granola bars. You hadn't really noticed it before, but your stomach had been pleading for a bite for the better half of the last ten minutes, so you noid enthusiastically. Judging by the size of just one bar you knew it would easily fill you for days, if not a week. Lex lowers a hand with gloss-painted fingernails onto the surface, leaving you a large chunk of the granola.

"This is perfect, thanks." You assure her, already facing your enormous helping in hunger. It took more strength than you would have expected to pry a piece off, and Lex couldn't help but giggle at your struggle, but you pulled off a relatively sizeable piece to nibble on. She puled up a seat and started on her own, finishing the entire bar before you could finish your own piece.
"Well, what should we do now?" Lex asks, somewhat dreamily. Her excitement hadn't faded, and she was thinking hard.

Swallowing what remained of your last bite, you crane your neck to look her in the eye.
"Whatever you want to do is fine, although it's been nagging in the back of my mind that we should do something fun with my size. Like you said before, it doesn't have to be a negative thing. And with Dani out of the way the possibilities are endless," you tell her.
Lex has her curiosity piqued by your suggestion, eyes lighting up once more.

"Oooh, you're right, there are so many things you must be able to do that would have been impossible otherwise," she confirms, hunting for an idea.
1213221111121221222121212121211222112212.title: Lunch

choices: They go to the mall.
They decide to have fun here.
1213221111121221222121212121211222112212.content:
"How about we go to the mall and freak people out!" the blonde goddess said, a mischievous smile lighting up on her face. You pondered the thought, stroking your chin. It could be fun.

"I guess that would be cool..."

Lex smiled further, reaching down a glossy index finger in order to scoop you up into her palm. With you safely nestled away in your protector's hand, you watched as Lex got up from her seat and headed upstairs.

"I'm not going to the mall in my work clothes. I'm going to change first..." she said, opening the door to her room before closing the door and placing you on her nightstand.

"Wait, what?"

You eyes bugged out as the twenty year old goddess unbuttoned her work pants and slipped them off without a care in the world, followed by her work shirt.

"Lex! W-What do you think you're doing?" you yelled. Lex cocked her head inquisitively at your outburst, before her mouth gaped open in surprise. Your face flushed beet red, and to your further embarassment, Lex's mouth upturned in a cocky smirk.

"What's that, Ant? Like what you see?" she asked seductively, sauntering over to you and placing her hands on her hips while wearing nothing but her white bra and panties.

You nodded shyly, to which Lex giggled.

"Just to warn you, if you're going to stay with me... I sleep naked," she winked, before pulling on a frayed pair of short shorts and a white tank top that exposed her midriff.

"Now..."
1213221111121221222121212121211222112212.title: Changing before the Mall

choices: on the floor infront of Dani's cage
on the top of her dresser
1213221111121221222121212121211222112212.content:
Lex leaned down and turned her ear toward you, accidentally giving you a view of down the collar of her shirt. “Can you say that again?”
After a moment to reorganize your thoughts it takes a second to actually say what you said before, with no small shortage of distain. “Could you….” Lex was leaning over farther to hear you and how her cleavage was growing as her chest was now leaning on the table.
“Ant, speak up”
“Could you put…”
Lex had turned to look at you and realized where you eyes had buried themselves. “ANT! My eyes are up here little boy!”
Your attention and eyes instantly moved to her’s “Could you please keep me in the…” the final word refused to come out of your mouth, half intimidation, half reluctance to ask to be caged like a little pet.
Suddenly a hand enveloped you and moved you instantly in front of her suddenly gigantic and stunning face “…cage?”
She had filled in the word you could not say, automatically your mouth uttered “yes” without your mind’s permission.

An eternity passed

Lex’s face was unreadable, “You want me to put you in Dani’s old hamster cage?”
Sheepishly your head nods itself on autopilot.

Another eternity in front of her untelling face. With glacial slowness her hand moved you closer to her face, leaning you over as if to move your head and shoulders into her mouth to be bitten off. Your body is a stone unable to do anything and your mind was empty, just a passenger. Giant lips talk in slow motion, “Ant, you really want to be in her old hamster cage?”

You nod again.

“Say it”

What? Why do you need to say it?

“Say it Ant”

“Put me in Dani’s old….”

Her gaze was something you could feel on your skin. “Here this might help” The upper buttons of her shirt were one by one plucked off with her free hand and a view of modest but pleasantly ample cleavage appeared below you. Without much warning you were abruptly squeezed between the two breasts, pinning your arms to your side. Your head was left free to look around. Her hands moved away leaving you trapped by your two new best friends.

Lex turned and walked upstairs, every step jiggled her grip on you and you began to slide down. “Alright Ant here is the----“ her breasts moved like quick sand, and now you were complete enveloped by them. All sense of where you were or where you were going was denied by your round friends and their sports bra prison.

Abruptly fingers adjusted your confinement so you can see again. After looking around you assume you are in Lex’s room. There is a small hamster cage sitting on the floor just inside her walk in closet. The rest of her room appears to be very large and decorated with models of all shapes and sizes.“Is this something you want to be kept in Ant?”

You wiggled in your fleshy prison, “Yes, yes it is.”

A hand unceremoniously removed you from your pleasantly futile struggle. The motion’s sudden, near violent motion scared the daylights out of you. “So Ant you want…” You look in her eyes “To be kept right there”.

Wrong choice

Her eyes narrowed and cheeks blushed a shade “What?!? No. No little boy, that’s not an option. As far as you are concerned that was a one time deal. You need to cool off.” Her hand moved you away and the world rushed up past you. All of a sudden a glass wall moved up past you with alarming speed. SPLASH. COLD! Freezing cold water.

A simple pitcher of ice water. Freezing water surrounded you. It’s too deep to stand, the sides frozen cold. Above is the rim of the pitcher, a good thirty feet above you. “LEX!”
Her hands pick up the pitcher, rescue! It tilts, ice clinks, freezing water pours out into a glass. Mercy, you crawl up the angled glass only to have it become vertical inches from your grasp and again ice water rushes up to meet you. Looking back up her face is there looking down at your with amusement, taking the entire field of view “Say it Ant, I’m a busy woman and I need to get you squared away before I go out soon. Otherwise you can stay there.”

This was misery and she could leave any second. “Put me in Dani’s cage Lex! Put me in Dani’s cage! Please get me out of here!” This time the words flowed easily.

Lex reached in and picked you out giggling. Still holding you over the freezing abyss she let you dangle by a leg“Are you sure Ant? You didn’t seem sure about being taken care of in a cage earlier.”

“Put me in a cage and take care of me Lex!”

“That’s a good little boy”

Lex then puts you-
1213221111121221222121212121211222112212.title: Ask to be put in the cage now.

choices: this is your chance to try to escape
take your chance in the cage
1213221111121221222121212121211222112212.content:
Feeling relived to be out of her hands and back on your own two feet you stand in front of her legs while she kneels on the floor. Maybe Lex was not as nice as you were hoping. Right now you are too busy being cold. Her hands grab a T-Shirt from her hamper and dries you off, “There we go, good as new. Now Ant, it’s time for you to get into your cage! About face and march mini mister”.

Reluctantly you obey, that pitcher was a threat to be kept at bay for now. Only after fully turning around you notices just how CLOSE the cage is. Two fingers and a thumb pull the spring clasp open and swing the door open in front of you. A feeling of unease builds as you take the last step to the cage and stop. Was this really a good idea? You just met Lex and she could be-

Your thoughts are cut off as one of her fingers gently but undeniably places itself on your butt and nudges you forward into the cage. You are now inside a teen age girl’s hamster cage. Quickly you look back, the cage door is open. Much to your surprise it stays that way as the hands move away.

Lex stands up and leans over to speak to you as she gathers some towels, “There you go Ant, your own cage, just like you asked. I’m not going to close the door, this way you can get comfortable in there without having to panic, I’m going to take a shower, don’t go anywhere little guy, if I catch you spying on me, you will not like what happens.”
1213221111121221222121212121211222112212.title: on the floor infront of Dani's cage

choices: Lex returns
someone else finds you
1213221111121221222121212121211222112212.content:
Over the next few minutes you take time to explore your cage, never drifting too far from the only opening. Most of the space is wasted above you, but there is still a small apartment’s length and width empty at your disposal. There is literally nothing else in the cage. Was this a mistake? Just what is there to do in a cage?

Lex returns wearing a towel around her body and hair. “Heya Ant! Good to see you are still in there. Are your accommodations big enough?” She seemed to be asking innocently in spite of her ice pitcher treatment from before, though she knew damn well there is enough space for your tiny stature. She looked at you briefly and began to gather cloths off her hangers to try on. “Yes…it’s big enough” She was placing cloths across her body and looking in the mirror. “Oh good, I was hoping you’d say that”. Unease played in your mind but nothing bad. “Um Lex, I am happy you are taking care of me, but um….what am I supposed to do in here? Can I have something to do? I mean just looking through bars all day is going to get boring.” Without turning around from the mirror she replied “You want something to do? Well I don’t suppose I can blame you. I’ll tell you what, I’ll let you have the time it takes me to get ready to find something to do.” With that she left leaving you to figure out something.

There was nothing in the cage but you. Nothing to do. Lex returned, after transforming herself from post shower drenched to a beautiful girl ready for a night at the movies. She lay face down on the floor in front of your cage door looking through the bars at you.

“Did you find something”
“No, there is nothing in here”
“Well there is you”
“What am I supposed to do with that”
“I don’t like your tone little boy, don’t go anywhere”
Where the hell would you go?
Lex abruptly left, minutes past and she came back.
“Here little boy, here is something you can do”

She produced a Barbie doll and proceeded to remove it’s clothes, “take off your clothes”

“What? No I’m not being naked in this cage, no way!”

Lex up ended the cage and you toppled into her hand, “Oh yes you are.”

Her hands proceed to rip and tear your cloths away, in spite of your best efforts. “No please stop it Lex!”

You are placed back on the ground and your hands cover your privates automatically. She looks at her handiwork and smiles, “You are totally naked now Ant. And guess what, you don’t have any cloths anymore, because you resisted, they are tatters. I may have given them back to you, but not anymore. This is your own fault. But at least she is naked too. And guess what? You have something to do now!”

This was not what you had in mind.

As if things were not bad enough, she moved the naked doll and pressed you to it. “Lex no way! No way! Just stop!” A hair tie suddenly pressed your hips to the doll’s. The hands moved away leaving you helplessly bound to the doll. It only took an instant to realize the tie was not going to have mercy on you.

Lex nonchalantly bound the rest of your torso to the doll and your hands behind her back. “Ant, what did I say about saying no to me?”

“No way Lex, this is not cool, stop it!”

“You wanted something to do in the cage, this is all you are going to get.”

The hand holding you to the doll moves you both back in the cage.

“Here you go Ant, safe in Dani’s hamster cage, with something to do. I am going out for a while, and I will see you when I get back. Also…” her hand reached down to the door and pressed the springs to the latch in.

Closed it, and let the springs expand again, latching it from the outside.

You want to get up and open the door but the doll you are tied to keeps you anchored to the ground without question. While tied to the doll and not going anywhere until Lex unties you. It was uncomfortable plastic, heavy on your hands tied to it’s back, rigid on your hips, and the plastic breasts were face level and pressing into it painfully.

“If you get bored of her, you can always try to open the door if you are really bored, but I don’t know why you would want to open it, after you begged to be in the cage. I expect you two to have a nice romantic evening without any interruptions. I’ll be back to take her home and tuck you in for the night Ant.”

Lex turned and left. Leaving you bound to the doll. Struggling wildly for your freedom from your plastic lover. On the floor of her closet. In a latched cage, unsure if you can even get to the springs and then down enough to free yourself. Just a little boy trapped, and left like a discarded possession You are not going anywhere.
1213221111121221222121212121211222112212.title: take your chance in the cage

121322111112122122212121212121122211222.content:
It all seems like a rut to you by now, and all the usual suspects are there. Danielle is again pressing you intentionally into her shoe, just enough to make you almost miserable but not enough to harm you. How she figured out exactly what was too far is beyond you... it was almost as if she had practiced this before. After repeated rollings against the insole of her soliary heel that you had been placed in, you realize that you have entered an entirely different room. Ever since she had changed classes your torment had been prolonged by her transit through the hall, but now it looked like the relief would be in sight once she sat down for her next class, or whatever this ended up to be.

The sounds you now hear are reminiscent of something, but you just can't match it up. Then, as if my magic, it comes to you: It was the now-unmistable sound of your school's cafeteria... which could lead to a number of advantages or disadvantages. Now that you had been exposed to Danie's true character and mannerisms you knew that escape was on your list of priorities. Though the stunning beauty of her foot hadn't lost its hold over you entirely, it was mind over matter or you would end up as her slave forever. In the seconds that passed she took a seat at one of the nearest tables to the entrance, and her heels come to rest underneath it, and she gives you another push with the ball of her heel for emphasis.

Snapping into a serious, open-to-suggestion mode, you survey the area around you. At first it seems like you are in luck; her hand drops down and starts to remove you from the shoe. In a few seconds you have been scooped p in Dani's grasp and taken from the landscape you hd been so bittersweetly attached to. The giantess lifts you over to the tabletop, exposing your eyes to the harsh light that you had been sheltered from beforehand from being so low to the ground. A giggle from Danielle reminds you that you should be on point and alert, since her deceitfulness never seemed to lose its edge today. You blink your eyes several times to adjust, and observe that you are...
121322111112122122212121212121122211222.title: Removed

choices: She's bored with it and scoops you out.
"That should add some extra flavor."
1213221111121221222121212121211222112221.content:
...at an empty table, and Danielle places you next to her lunch tray. Your head was pounding now, do to being flaunted around so often by your supposed "goddess." It was amazing how quickly you had gone from being her friend and equal to a pet and a slave. Didn't it dawn on her yet that you are still the same Ant, her friend who even had a crush on her, and not some insect? If only you could make her realize it... or chances were that she already did and simply didn't care anymore. The titaness drums her fingers on the table, studying your every move with mischievous intent glinting in her eyes. They felt like enormous searchlights, never allowing you to evade their notice.

Danielle reaches past you to her lunch, pulling back a cup of soup form the left side of the tray. She has begun to ignore you now, focusing on the food now. Its warmth emenates in waves, soothing your headache a bit. Unsure of what to do at this point anyway you find yourself drawn to it, and lean up against the styrofoam cup. The broth warms you up immediately, and you know this was the perfect rememdy, considering they didn't make aspirin for people your size. The peripheral gaze of the giantess catches this, however, and before you can blink you have been snatched up and torn from the ground like so many times before this. But this time she didn't lift you up to face level to talk.

In fact, as soon as her hand had escalated to a decent height her fingers unclenched, letting you test your luck with gravity. You can't believe your eyes as you see the soup cup rushing toward you, or so it appeared. With a tiny plunk you land in the steaming broth, ringles spreading out in circular ripples. She claps her hands excitedly, and you find yourself in horror. Here you were, treading broth and feeling the scalding broth on your body, and she was watching you like a flea circus. You reach out for a noodle drifting by, as to conserve energy, since she wasn't bored with your antics yet and didn't seem like she intended to rescue you. It'll do for now, but how long does she plan to keep this up?

Her countenance suddenly changed, and you see a new idea has popped into her mind. Her restless hands grop to the right of the tray, and you can just barely see over the rim what it is as she lifts it into the air; a plastic spoon, which had come with the soup you were now residing in. Your fear takes over, and in the ensuing emotion you lose your grip on the life preserver you had made of a noodle. Now you find yourself sinking into the broth, which was a lot heavier than water with lots of stuff swirling within it. Surely she didn't hope to actually... use that, correct? But your eyesight couldn't be denied as you fought back the now numbing pain of the soup's heat. The spoon descended over you like a dark cloud.
1213221111121221222121212121211222112221.title: Lunch Time

1213221111121221222121212121211222112221.content:
"That should add some extra flavor." Danielle booms overhead, already licking her lips in anticipation. You're taken aback at her words (even after seeing all that she has done in the previous hour) that the girl you had known for so long and had always seemed so kind was already resorting to cannibalism over the shrunken man she found. You continue to tread in the broth, knowing that there had to be a solution or a way to appeal to her so that she wouldn't eat you alive like any other ingredient in the school-issued soup.

"Come on, Dani, this is just insane! You can't eat me, I'm your friend, remember!?" you plead to the giantess. Staying afloat was becoming tiring, although the saline count of the broth was enough to keep you at least partially buoyant. Danielle looks amused, either at your struggle to survive or at her own wit for putting in some "extra flavor" the the mundane school lunch. Either way your words had failed to sway her, so you would have fall back on the plan you hadn't even pieced together yet. Getting out was the objective, but what were the means?

"Wow, this is gonna be delicious," the giantess says, her craving evident in her voice.
1213221111121221222121212121211222112221.title: Ruthless Danielle

You come to a quick descision as Dani licks her lips and picks up a spoon, so you frantically start to swim through the soup to the edge of the bowl. The somewhat viscous nature of the sop made it more tiring to swim through than, say, your local swimming pool, but you would rather be swimming through it than Dani's saliva.

After a lot of effort, you reach the side of the bowl, your final hurdle until freedom. Clambering onto a nearby noodle, you briefly hesitate, before climbing over the steep edge.
You land with a glancing blow on the table beneath you, dripping wet with warm soup. So Dani had probably noticed all this, but you are too scared to turn around to see the look on her face...

Go with the new girl, taking another risk.
1213221111121222.content:
But you know well enough what you should do. Having already reached a steep enough summit so that you can reach the counter, you can now access it freely. Danielle and her equally-gigantic lab partner are still oblivious to your presence, so you have no trouble traversing from Point A to Point B. The interlude between Danielle's chest and the counter isn't far at all; about two inches. Once your shoes hit the countertop, you crouch slightly, looking back to make sure you've retained your anonymity. Sure enough, no one was aware. Then again, who honestly would notice your little jump that was so insignificant juxtaposed with what was going on with the regular-sized people? After all, insects sneak by them every day.

Not wanting to waste your precious time, you head into the miniature city of lab supplies. There were various items that formed good cover, but you're more concerened with getting to a high enough position to be easily seen with the naked eye. And since you knew Danielle much better than the other girl, it would be safe to assume you should find one in your crush's line of site then. Ducking behind a thick beaker, you feast your eyes on the perfect spot for what you needed. A tall, thin beaker of about eight inches in height, directly to your left. It isn't long at all before you have scampered up it by hugging the wall. You're about halfway up, taking a second to scan the world around you.

Nothing was really going to interrupt this at the moment, so you have some time. Neverthless, you're in haste. Relative afety allows you to dwell on who that other girl with Danielle could be. Her face was certainly familiar, even in your worm's eye view. She had auburn hair, similar to Emily's, but longer and more curly toward the ends. Sparce freckles litter her paucious face, and you wish you knew her a little bit more in your current plight, so that you could justify asking for a helping hands from the giantess. At last youhave reached the top of the beaker, and take an awkward seat on its glass rim. Now all you would have to do was become a human signal... but to whom?

With your best effort, you scratch away at her huge, wiggling toes and hope it feels like a tickle to her. Unfortunately for you, her toes begin to wiggle more due to this and you are pulled into the gap between her big toe and the one next to it. You continue scratching as hard as you can in the hope of catching her attention. You begin to hear slight giggling coming from above. This must be a good sign!
Motivated, you scratch even harder, having quite a lot of fun by this point. But your fun is suddenly ruined, as Emily stops giggling. She is staring right at you.

She has an unusual look on her face, almost one of... guilt. Suddenly, she...

...returns to a face of more grim intent. that's when you noticed the sides were closing in on you; or toes in this instance. Though onset panic threatens to encompass you, the prevailing urge to stay calm wins that battle. But there was no way you would just stand idlely here while Emily tried to erase your existence, if that was in fact what she was plotting for. Feeling a sense of deja vu, you are then hit by an oncoming toe, which atters you back into submission as you land awkwardly onto the sole of her sandal, with the opposing toe hovering overhead. Just about top open your mouth to scream, it is muffled by the flesh of that second toe, which is beginning to suffocate you under its weight.

Now it was time to panic, you compromise, and the dam bursts. Sweat mixed your own adrenaline is the smell in the air, and you are slowly being bpainned onto your back over the sandal strap, which was to your right, the direction Emily was pushing you. Surely she wouldn't kill you though, just for a cover-up, you thought she was your friend! How quickly she would betray you, then. Almost losing the will to fight, you collapse under the toe's unrelenting force and feel several cracks in your chest; most likely broken ribs. But you're not finished yet. Since your first line of protection of your chest has caved in, Emily hasn't yet compensated for it and you are able to slip past by a lightning-fast roll out from under it.
12132211122.title: Collapsed

121322111222.content:
Just as you roll out of the way and feel victory surge through your veins, one of Emily's colossal toes drags you back towards her feet. Damn it! How could your best friend do this to you? You scream and try to catch somebody's attention, but Emily plants her big toe on top of your face to silence you.
You are dragged underneath the huge writhing tentacles of flesh that are attempting to turn you to mush. A toe suddenly pushes you into another behemoth of a toe and part of your chest is crushed. You taste blood, and you open your mouth to scream, but instead of sound, more blood comes out. Why couldn't she finish this quickly!?

You feel your leg being crushed into paste, your arms painfully broken with a ghastly snap, your skull dented, and your consciousness fading. You are briefly exposed to the outside air again, and you look up to see Emily staring down at you with a look of extreme sorrow on her face.
She mouths "Sorry" to you, and that is the last thing you see before your torso explodes into a gory mess and everything goes black.

*Splat*

"What was that, Em?"
Emily looks down.
"Oh, ew! A bug got into my flip flops!"
"Haha! Stupid thing."
121322111222.title: Ouch...

You step up on to the edge of Emily's sandal. From here, your head reaches barely halfway up her big toe. This is going to be hard work. It is a crevasse just big enough for you to stand in at its highest point, but as her foot ever so slightly adjusts, you realize that moving too close could get you trapped at best or crushed at worst. The arch of the foot, however, seems perfect. It's more sensitive than the callused side of the big toe and if you tried to get between the toes you'd probably be squished. Here goes. You kick the ceiling of the crevasse with all your might.
Her foot involuntarily moves upwards and slams back down, slightly further away. Emboldened by your success, you charge forward and start to punch as hard as you can.
Thumb outside of fist, hit with the first two knuckles. You wouldn't want to risk even more injury than is already likely here. Knowing her practical minset about the shrking you know that chances were good that you would be used for something that took advantage of your diminishment. After squirming a bit on her palm (you were still very uncomfortable with your size and were learning to abstain from any exaggerated movements with each passing second) Miss Blake gets an idea for where to put you that will keep you busy.

"Well, you know how I was telling you before about the usefulness of a person when they've shrunk?" The giantess bellows, once again forgetting that the noise was a deafening thundercrack in your position. After shuddering from the impact you nod vigorously, just wanting to get away.
"I think I have a job for you, if you'll help me out. These hard-to-reach places in the room have gathered a lot of dust over the years. It might even be fun for you, but once again the choice is yours." You don't see what else you'll do, so you agree again.

The woman places you on the top right of a shelf which ended in a small niche. Almost a perfect fit for you, although you would have to crouch a little in order to pass comfortably. She gives you a reassuring pat (more like a light tap) to send you on your way and pulls up a chair. Miss Blake puts her head in her hands and just watches as you slip through the nook. In seconds a massive hand deposits a miniature toothbrush, about to size of a canoe paddle for you, for dusting purposes.

It's a vastly uneventful ten minutes, but at lat you do a decent job of cleaning the niche. Not that anyone could really tell if you missed a spot, since it would be nearly microscopic. After couching away the air, thick with floating dust particles, you walk out and signal for Miss Balke to retrieve you. She has her back turned again, fiddling with the regulator again, you assume. As soon as you pass through the opening, though, she spins around quickly. In all of the surprise you are blasted with the laser again, and it knocks you down.

Picking yourself up quickly, you know that this second time you must have gotten over the somewhat painful process. The verdict of what you now see is an absolutely gleeful Miss Blake, cradling the size regulator in her arms. Well... this just got even more awkward, you think to yourself at the display.
"If you haven't noticed yet, Ant, you've come just become equal what your names alludes to... an ant. I regret having you forced to be involved with this study, as I've always liked you, but I'm afraid you won't be returning to your former size any time soon, if ever." The words hang in the air, ominous.

"It's not that I have anything personal against you, Ant -- quite the contrary. It's just that for me to accurately study your behavior habits after the shrinking process concludes you'll have to stay here and willingly cooperate. If you don't, and it'll be unforunate, I'll be forced to discipline you accordingly. But as long as you just go along with it, in time you will be released," The teacher explains, trying to maintain her previous cheery tone despite her apparent smypathies toward you. Well, this just took a turn for the worst. How do you react to the news?

"Trying to escape anywhere is hopeless... this is your last chance to return to me before I will have to discipline you. Now, come over here." your giant teacher says, darkly. You actually consider doing what she says for a second, but you see an opportunity to dash under a metallic chest. You take this opportunity and run over to it as fast as you can. Miss Blake stepped in front of you but you dodge her spiky heels and dive under the chest. Luckily you are small enough to fit under it.
"Smart move, Ant." Miss Blake says sarcastically. "Unfortunately, in the current situation, I am not strong enough to move that chest." she admits. You silently cheer, feeling victorious. But then...

Your worm's eye view is limited from below the chest, but the faint aura that hung around your teacher's body was enough to signify her point. All you can see are her feet, though the rest of her body and clothes were growing along with them. Eventually you hear Miss Blake cry out in joy, evidently pleasantly surprised at her new body. From what you could gauge, you would assume she was about ten feet tall; over double her original height.

"Now to move this obstacle so we can return to business, right my little student?" She coos, and before long your shelter was lifted off and thrown to the other side of the room. With a metallic clang it left a massive dent in the opposing wall, but you're much more worried about the mind-bendingly large woman that now stood over you, with her hands on her hips in mock-disappointment.
"That was fun, but I think I like my original size better." Another blast from the size regulator and Miss Blake return to her original, slightly tall size. Even so, you're in just the same predicament as you stand at the feet of who had just become your goddess.

"Okay, okay. I know when I'm beaten," you say, not reall sure where the words were coming from as they fled across your tongue.
"But please, be reasonable, Miss B. I'm just a kid, I have a faimly, friends, and maybe even a girl who likes me around here. Can't we just call it a day and you can grow me back to my regular height? I promise I'll return for another experiment, just don't put me in that box!" you plead to her.

You fall through the air, flailing your arms and legs around like a maniac, and land on the bottom of the glass box with incredible force. You swear you hear something break!
"Owww..." you groan, peeling yourself from the bottom of the box. You see a microphone in the corner of the box and you limp over to it. "Why did you do that? Aren't you meant to keep your specimen unharmed?" you say into it.
"At least you finally understand that you are a specimen rather than a human now." she says. "Also, no. I said I would discipline you for misbehavior, and that is what you get."
"But, Miss..." you moan.
"Silence. You have a bed, a chair, some food and drink, and a few books and magazines, all miniaturized of course. Go about your daily business, and bear in mind that anything you do or say is being recorded. I have to go and get something, I will be right back." Miss Blake walks to the heavy door and removes the bar, pulling it open. You hear her heels clip-clop off into the distance...

Trapped in a glass box. So simple, yet incredibly ingenious. Obviously you were no tree frog; climbing up an entirely smooth surface without any extra help would be futile. You spent the first two minutes soaking in the overwhelming shock of your true imprisonment (led on by your naivety in believing you would be allowed to go home free after such a controversial experiment was done). What had you really expected, for Miss Blake to just hope you wouldn't spread the word about her device before all the bugs were fixed? No, this had been your folly. Still, you only wish more comfortable measures could have been taken, rather than having been to remain cooped up in this translucent prison for the rest of your days.

Yet other ideas came to kind for your escape plot. Your science teacher would need to take you out for some sort of test eventually, right? Myabe then you could try your hand at fleeing. Also there might be a way to, judging by the lightweight mass of the glass box, be able to push against the walls enough (discreetly and over a longer period of time) until it reached the edge. But then there were a lot of variables on how you would survive the fall, or even if. Your faith in people had been shaken this day, but you would like to think that soner or later the woman's conscience will catch up with her. So you lay against one of its walls, temporarily defeated, as Miss Blake returned to the room, bringing something new with her this time.
141332111111.title: The Glass Box

1413321111111.content:
You are temporarily startled by the clunk of the door opening, but then unsurprised when you see your captor Miss Blake enter the room. She has her thumb and index finger together as if she was holding something very small. She strolls over to a large cupboard and pulls the door open, retrieving a microscope from its interior. Your heart sunk. Why would she need a microscope? Was she going to shrink you to a microscopic size and watch you wrestle bacteria??

She places the microscope onto a small table and approaches your glass box. "I am afraid I am going to have to sedate you." she informs you.
"What!?" you shout, although not very loudly due to your tiny size. "What did I do to deserve that!?"
"Nothing." she replies, simply. "I need to conduct a test on you that may be painful if you are conscious. It's for the best."
"Then what is that microscope for!?" you yell in protest.
"I need to jab you in the arm with this small needle," she says, holding up something so small that you cannot see it, "and I don't want to go jabbing you in the head now, do I?"
Miss Blake reaches into the glass box and grabs you by the hoodie. She walks over to the microscope, holding you all the way. Although you find yourself wondering, would it be more fun if she was more friendly with you? Despite your macrophillic brain, you were not exactly having a ball.
Miss Blake puts you gently onto a glass slide. "Lay down." she commands you.
"No!" you reply, rebelliously.
"Very well." she says, grimly. She walks over to the cupboard and takes out a roll of masking tape. She then pins your struggling body down with her enormous finger and takes of tiny tabs of tape, and sticking each of your limbs to the slide. "Here we go, then!" she says, slightly giggling. The last thing you remember is a giant needle point coming towards you, a shot of pain in your left shoulder, and consciousness slowly fading as the pain and fear were torn from you...
