14133211111111.content:
Your eyes snap open, and ripples of tensions flow down your body. Blurry eyes, a floating consciousness, and the works overcome you as you struggle to wake up fully. At last your focus returns, and you make your first try at sitting up straight. The first thing you notice is the faint burning of pain in your right leg, although it couldn't have been from the needle; that had pierced your left shoulder. Something must have happened during these gaps in what you can recall, of that you were certain. You sat in the same glass box as before, but oddly enough there's a different aspect of it now. The top hatch, normally sealed shut, was left slightly ajar, allowing extra light to spill through.

Another difference in your habitat is that the room is plunged in darkness, save for a lamp that hung over your see-through cell. Now how was Miss Balke going to monitor you in such darkness, you contemplate, rising to your feet again. Your nerves vehementally disagreed with your decision but you could tell they had been resting long enough. Judging by mental clock you had been out for about three or four hours, and it sure felt like longer. For the slightest second you think you hear breathing, but then you realize it must have been the sound of your own movement. This ox you were kept in had been full of dust ever since you were first placed there, and you can remember it making that sound when you walked around then.

Well, there were two things on your mind, no actually three. One what the incision in your leg was from, two was why you couldn't remember anything after the sedative until now, and lastly why the hatch was left open and how you could use this opportunity to escape. The cracked-open doorway was at your walking level, so if you chose to trust this eerie circumstance and just leave you could. Hobbling toward it, you take one last chance to think. Deeming ti safe according to the only knowledge you had, you take a step out of the doorway, and meet empty air. The rest of your body shoots down after it, since most of your weight had been put into that step. Next thing you know you're hurtling into the abyss, screaming with horror.

But even more to your surprise, her loss of balance causes her sunglasses (evidently too big for her) to become loose, and they fall to the ground near to you. One of the lenses cracks, and the arms on the glasses become dented.
"Oh, great." Whitney exclaims sarcastically. "Now I'm going to have to go to Paris to get another pair."
Now is probably your time to hide, you decide, burying yourself deeper into the space between Whitney's toes.

You suddenly slide to the left, and then feel brief weightlessness as the flip-flop beneath you is removed and thrown to the ground. Lucky you are wedged between two of Whitney's toes, or the fall might've killed you. A look over your shoulder reveals an annoyed looking girl sitting on a bench, apparently searching her foot. Without her glasses obscuring them, Whitney's eyes appear as two orbs of a stunning, piercing shade of green, highlighted by copious amounts of mascara and other makeup. The intense green didn't really go with her hot pink hair, you decide. Maybe that is why she wore shades.

"I'm going to find you, pesky thing," Whitney threatens, searching her toes, "and when I do, you're gonna pay..."
1623211122121221.title: Bite Whitney's toe harder this time for the...

choices: Whitney stands up, still looking for the bug.
She gives up and walks away... in your direction.
16232111221212211.content:
At first this had been a heartfelt revolution. and you had felt empowered by biting the obnoxious girl. It served her right, after all, even if you knew it wouldn't cause her much pain. But now, with the mask of anger etched on her face, she was doubtlessly enraged with this invisible pest who was dealing so much annoyance to her. With her legs spread out on the asphalt, she bends her knee in closer to her body for inspection, scanning the toes on the foot you clung to for any signs of malevolence. There was an impass here, though: Hide or be found.

Taking one more glance at the angry goddess, you choose life, which in this case was synonymous for hiding. Ducking between her toes wouldn't be near enough, though. You would be forced to taking a daring leap off of them and to take off running in the opposite direction. There wasn't much youcould hope for, other than that Kirstie wouldn't be hanging around anywhere you passed, but either way it wasn't going to stop you. Taking a deep breath, you let go of the skin on Whitney's big toe and let yourself land on the ground, feetfirst like a cat.

Maybe you won't run away just yet, you rationalize. The group of bored recess kids had clustered a little closer than you remembered on the way over here, though none we looking at you or the angry girl you had just left behind. For now you are content to duck behind her foot, outside the realm of sight of Whitney as she frantically searches between her toes to njo avail. You can hear her gape as she spots the tiny red mark you had left on her flesh, and that bears some satisfaction inside of it for you. Now if you could only stay concealed.
16232111221212211.title: Run And Hide

choices: Rhiannon sees Kirstie...
You inevitably become a living snack...
16232112.content:
Your heart sinks as you hear this. Kirstie releases all pressure on you, giving you a brief moment of fresh air. But, as if deliberately interrupting this, Kirstie's huge hand swoops down and grabs you, holding you in front of her face. "You ARE kinda warm, aren't you Ant?" she laughs. Kinda!? Talk about understatements!
Kirstie sniffs. "You smell like chicken!" she chirps. "I bet you taste like it, too." she says, licking her lips.
"Kirstie! Don't do this! Please!" you beg. Kirstie erupts into manic laughter. "You are really not in the position to give orders!" she says between fits of evil laughter. "Kirstie! What are you doing!?" you scream, as she tilts her head back and dangles you over her massive, gaping mouth. She flicks her tongue menacingly. "Prepare to become my lunch!" she laughs, lowering you into her mouth. You break down into a convulsing, sobbing mass of fear...
16232112.title: "Prepare to become my lunch!"

choices: Kirstie pops you back in her mouth, it's too late.
Rhiannon demands you from the girl, and they face-off.
162321121.content:
All you can think of is how abrupt your life was going to end. Just a short time before you had been living life well, if not to a positive extent. It was only after your freak accident, which resulted in your unnatural transferance from an average-height male to a insect's stature that changed all of that. It was a terrible story, only this was no novel. It was all too real, and in your own power there would be no escape. Now you were about to become a living snack in the jaws of an equally terrible woman; Kirstie Ross. Humans simply weren't meant to be so tiny and at the mercy of others, you think philisophically, but then there was no one around to halt this descent into her mouth's cavern. So you hang, still spasmastic with terror.

All of this in a matter of seconds. But evidently someone above has been watching over you, it seems, judging by the next event. Once you were mere inches to her teeth, Rhiannon ambles by, texting on her phone. You see this as your last redeeming chance, so you do all the waving and notice-generating antics you can, to the confusion of Kirstie. And, luckier still, she catches it all in her peripheral vision and snaps the phone shut, racing forward. A desperate scream stops Kirstie's hand in mid-swoop, and she instinctively pulls it back, as if being warned of a poisionous food she was about to consume. However, you stil end up in the palm of this vengeful giantess, yet for the moment she is distracted by Rhiannon.
162321121.title: Redeeming Interruption

choices: Kirstie digests you
Kirstie feels like throwing up
1623211211.content:
You breath a heavy sigh of relief, as Kirstie stops just as you are about to enter into her waiting maw. Rhiannon is bounding over, and any minute now, she will free you from this tall nerdy sadist.

Except, Kirstie realizes far too quickly for your liking that Rhiannon is coming over because she probably saw your spasming petrified body dangling in the air. And if that's the case, how could Kirstie enjoy her lunch? The thought of Ant, of you, sliding down her throat and into her stomach, to be torn apart and boiled into liquid for her still-growing body...it was arousing her too much to miss out on because some bitch might come to your defense.

Before Rhiannon can make it, Kirstie forcefully shoves you into her salivating mouth, leaving you little time to react before you are face-down on her sticky tongue. It's incredibly humid surrounded by this teen girl's warm breath. Looking forward, you can see a falloff from the end of her tongue, to her uvula, and then into darkness...

"Kirstie! Kirstie!!" Rhiannon finally makes it, "What did you just eat?"

"...Nuffin'" Kirstie tries to feign ignorance, but your body is still big enough as to where she can't really speak normally, ruining the whole effect. You start shouting as loud as you can to get Rhiannon's attention, but it's hard when saliva is constantly fighting to get a hold of you.

"Yeah, right! I swear I saw you about to eat Ant! Spit him out right now!!" Rhiannon screams at Kirstie, who looms over in height by a few inches. Over the sounds of the playground, she can not hear you.

In Rhiannon's fit of terror for you, Kirstie can barely contain her love for your flavor and texture; you really do taste delicious, like chicken. Your screaming and spasmatic movement only intensifies as you realize this evil girl is about to really do it. Your body is sliding into her throat. She's going to really eat you.

*Gulp* *gllk* "I really don't know what you're talking about." Kirstie replies over-politely with a slight smirk. God that felt amazing.

Rhiannon's face empties of all color as she can clearly make out a lump in Kirstie's throat slide down into the depths of her body. Tears well up in her eyes; that was a life. A human life, swallowed by some careless maniacal girl into a pit of death.

Speaking of, a sputtering squelch resounds as your body squeezes into the opening to Kirstie's stomach, before depositing you in the digested leftovers of her breakfast. You tremble violently, nearly puking from the revolting surroundings you've been plopped into. Booming gurgles and strange disgusting noises violate your eardrums and drive you to near insanity. This is your worst nightmare. Not even another teen girl's stomach, but the mid-digestion belly of a tall skinny sadistic bully. You can already feel your clothes starting to tear and disintegrate in the bubbling knee-deep pool. Her fast metabolism will kill you in minutes.

"...You...ATE him. You KILLED HIM! YOU KILLED HIM KIRSTIE! How could you?!" Rhiannon wails.

"What the hell? Are you high or something? I have no clue what you're on about." Without any physical evidence in the way, Kirstie is free to play it completely cool and make Rhiannon look crazy. It's not like her morals were going to stop her.

"He's dying in there!! What the fuck is wrong with you?!"

"Wow, okay, look," Kirstie leans into Rhiannon's face and belches at her. It's warm and loud, Ant's meaty flavor and the remnants of breakfast's aroma booming out with excess stomach air from inside this teenage girl, "If you want to know about what I've eaten so bad all you had to do was ask."

Kirstie snickers to herself and walks off. Rhiannon collapses to her knees sobbing. She can't get that horrible image out of her mind.

Meanwhile, you're living it.
1623211211.title: Futile Rescue

16232112111.content: By the time Kirstie burps in Rhiannon's face, your body is unconscious. What's left of it is floating amongst a thick, bubbly soup, melting inside the teenager's stomach. No could save you now. Throughout the next couple hours, Kirstie greatly enjoyed the various satisfied groans emitting from her full tummy, busy with digestion, as your existence became nutrients for her.
16232112111.title: Kirstie digests you

choices: Kirstie catches you with her open mouth.
You land on Rhiannon's head.
1623211212.content:
You are saved, you think to yourself! Although you are still held captive by this twisted giantess, Rhiannon was here, and she was going to make it all better!
...Right?
"Oh my Gosh Kirstie!" Rhiannon shrieks. "Was that... Ant Walker?"
"Umm... I can explain..." you hear Kirstie mutter.
"Are you crazy!? Were you about to EAT him!?" Rhiannon continues.
"Y-Yeah, and what are you going to do about it, Ann? Punch me?" Kirstie replies.
You look out from a fold in Kirstie's fist and see the ever-beautiful Rhiannon. She looked awfully pale, though. You try to visualize her & Kirstie fighting. Rhiannon is quite a fit girl, she does martial arts if you remember correctly. Yet Kirstie is rather strong, you think, recalling being kicked in the nuts by her last week. It would be a close one.
Breaking your thought, you are jolted to the right as Kirstie attemps to push Rhiannon away. You hear a high pitched yelp, followed by a growl of anger. How you wish you were not here right now.
You are thrown to the side again as Rhiannon blocks a punch from Kirstie. You then hear the sound of skin to skin contact as Rhiannon delivers a clean kick to your captor's stomach.
"Give him to me, or I will make you!" Rhiannon says menacingly.
"Fight! Fight! Fight!"
You hear a 'thud' followed by a yelp, and many more sounds such as this, when suddenly an idea strikes you.
You crawl up to the edge of Kirstie's hand, and gathering all your strength, you bite down into her flesh as hard as your body will allow.
"OUCH! The little brat bit me!" you hear Kirstie scream. You are suddenly launched up into the air, probably a reflex. You look down and hope to be caught by someone...
1623211212.title: Rhiannon demands you from the girl, and they fa...

choices: Alert Rhiannon of your presence.
Slide down her hair into her shirt for safety.
16232112122.content:
You squeeze your eyes shut and try not to gag as you spiral downwards, hopefully towards Rhiannon...

You land on a somewhat soft surface, and upon opening your eyes, you appear to still be quite high in the air. You approach the edge of your platform and a dizzy sight presents itself.
Below you is a well-concealed cleavage, probably Rhiannon's. The ground is very far below, and Kirstie seems to have not noticed you yet. You could warn Rhiannon that you are on her head, but at the risk of Kirstie noticing you. Maybe it would be better to take cover before things get nasty...
16232112122.title: You land on Rhiannon's head.

choices: Now get her attention so you can get away from Kirstie.
She suddenly freaks out, having felt your descent.
162321121222.content:
Figuring it would be more expedient just to slide down and ge to safety without having to alert the girl, you simply seize hold of a strand of raven-colored hair. You could slide down it like a fireman on a pole, and Kirstie most likely wouldn't be expecting anything like that. Besides, you think on your way down, things could have gotten ugly is she mistook you for a louse or something.

From what you knew of girls, they freaked out even more when they found bugs in their hair, so you want to make this quick. The two have now escalated to a shouting match on your account, which sets off a pan of guilt in your stomach as your drop continues. Even so, the only way you could earn Rhiannon's rescue would be to reach your destination, so you try to ignore it as the hair strand ends.

According to plan, you soundlessly drop into the shirt of the giantess, taking hold of the bra strap that lies beneath it. Anywhere else would have been much more noitceable, you justifty. After all, you respected Rhiannon and wouldn't willingly invade her priavcy just because you could do it without her conscious knowledge. Besides, you were terrified of what Kirstie might do if you were spotted again.
162321121222.title: Motives

choices: Kirstie knocks Rhiannon out and searches her body for you...
Kirstie shrinks Rhiannon to 3 feet tall to torture her further...
1623211212222.content:
"EEK!" Rhiannon suddenly squawks, turning round as she feels you descending rapidly and landing in her bra. "What was that?"
She turns around to face Kirstie again, but Kirstie takes Rhiannon's temporary distraction as an advantage, giving the girl an incredibly forceful slap. You flinch at the noise of harsh skin-to-skin contact and the feeling of Rhiannon stumbling a little. Kirstie now has the upper hand in the brawl.

Kirstie delivers a brutal punch to the side or Rhiannon's jaw, sending her spiralling to the ground with a thump. Lying on the concrete in pain, Rhiannon spits out a drop of blood.
"Kirstie! Stop this!" Rhiannon begs. You can tell she's not faking her fear.
"I saw Ant slide down into your bra," Kirstie begins. "Give him to me, and I'll spare you a lot of pain. I'm giving you the choice."
Rhiannon attempts to get up and flee, but Kirstie kicks her in the head and presses her foot against her stomach, preventing her from moving. The disturbing part is that Kirstie doesn't seem to care about her friend's welfare.
"I-I'll never give him to you!" Rhiannon protests. "I'm not letting you hurt Ant!"
You admire her for protecting you, but you'd rather take the pain from Kirstie for her. You'd never live it down if Rhiannon got hurt at your expense.

"Give. Ant. To. Me. Now." Kirstie orders, kicking the side of Rhiannon's head with each word. Holding back tears, Rhiannon stays silent. She is quite tall for a girl at 6 feet and knows some sort of martial arts, but Kirstie is and has always been a very strong and powerful girl. She stands at a momentous 6 foot 4, towering over almost all other guys at the school. Only Suzy surpassed her in height, and that was only by two inches. Without remorse, Kirstie raises her foot into the air and brings it down with speed onto Rhiannon's stomach, forcing the air out of her lungs. Rhiannon instinctively curls up into a foetal position and rolls onto her side, shivering in terror. Kirstie kneels down onto the ground and grabs Rhiannon's head, staring into her eyes.
"Give me Ant. Did you not understand the first and second time?" she demands. With a sadistic smile, she smacks Rhiannon's head against the ground a few times. Her eyes barely open, Rhiannon looks at Kirstie dizzily.
"Y-you're still not having him..."

Standing to her full height, Kirstie repositions herself over Rhiannon's head and sits down, trapping her head between her thighs. Kirstie tenses her thigh muscles and begins to bounce herself up and down using her feet. Rhiannon's head is constantly hit against the ground, unable to break free of Kirstie's grip. You feel sorry and very bad for the poor girl and you're surprised she's still conscious...
1623211212222.title: She suddenly freaks out, having felt your descent.

choices: Kirstie Caught you
Rhiannon woke up
16232112122221.content:
Your surprise was immediately lost as Kirstie hit Rhiannon’s head against the hard floor, finally knocking Rhiannon out. As soon as Kirstie saw this, she released Rhiannon and bent over her limp body. This wasn’t going to end well.

“Ant, where are you?”
You didn’t dare move, not wanting Kirstie to see where you could be.
“It’s no use hiding Ant. I’ll find you eventually.”

You could feel Kirstie feeling feeling all over Rhiannon’s body. You had to hide. You couldn’t be found. But you could let Kirstie violate Rhiannon either. There’s no thinking what she could do.

Finally, you decided to repay Rhiannon for what she did for you. As Kirstie reached over on one side of Rhiannon’s body, you quickly ran to the other side and ran out in the open, catching Kirstie’s attention.

“Oh no you don’t!” She yelled, throwing Rhiannon’s body to the side and chased after you. There was no escape, only stalling. If you could stall for long enough, Rhiannon might wake up and save you. That's if you could stall for long enough.

You jumped and slid around, trying to dodge Kirstie. After many minutes...
16232112122221.title: Kirstie knocks Rhiannon out and searches her bo...

choices: Rhiannon’s House
162321121222212.content:
As you ran around, you heard Rhiannon moving. You looked over quick and saw Rhiannon slowly getting up. You kept running, still distracting the now infuriated Kirstie.

“You know what Ant, you’re too much of a nuisance. I’m just going to kill you, just like a bug you’ve always been.”
No, this couldn’t be happening. She wasn’t that cruel, was she?

She continued to chase you, becoming relentless at this point. Suddenly, you tripped, landing on your back. Above you, you saw the strained face of your worse enemy. It turned to that of villainous hilarity at your predicament.

“Well well well. I guess your life will end as what your are; an ant.” You looked in shock as her foot raised and was about to come down, spelling your doom.
“No!” You screamed, shutting your eyes tightly. This was your end. You were going to die.

“No you don’t!” Came a screeching cry. A loud thud followed, the ground shaking. You opened your eyes and looked around. The once towering menence that was Kirstie was on the ground only a few feet away from you, Rhiannon standing where Kirstie just was. Her whole face was bloody and she had tons of scrapes. Least to say she wasn’t in good shape.

“Oh my gosh Ant, are you ok?”
“Yeah yeah. Rhiannon, your face. Your body...”
“Anthony, don’t worry about me. At your size, you could of been killed. I’m just glad your ok. Now, I’ve got to do something with her.”
“Why not just leave her here. She probably will just wake up by herself.”
“Nah, it’s too risky. Between what I just did to her and how badly she hurt me, we can’t just leave her. I’ve got to take her to the nurse. I just hope she doesn’t remember anything.”
“Yeah...”

Rhiannon picked you up and placed you in her bag, not having much time to think. She through it over her shoulder and grabbed Kirstie, carrying her to the nurse’s office. Once she got there, the nurse was quite puzzled.

“Oh my gosh, what happened to you?”
“Kirstie and I were arguing over some stupid thing and she really got me good. She knocked me out but I was able to wake up in time before she stole my bag. I accidentally knocked her out though.”
“Well...um. Ok, let me get you and Kirstie in beds and get you bandaged up. I’ll have to report this.”
“I understand.”

With that, Rhiannon and the nurse brought Kirstie in and placed her on a bed. The nurse looked over both of them and luckily Rhiannon didn’t get seriously injured, although she was going to have some headache later. Kirstie on the other hand was mostly unhurt, except for being unconscious of course. The nurse wrote up her report and soon after Kirstie woke up, much to Rhiannon’s misfortune.

“Ugh, where am I?”
“Oh, your up.”
“Oh god, I’m in the nurse’s office.” She scowled in disgust. She looked over and saw Rhiannon. “Oh god you’re here too.”
“What do you mean!? You’re the one who beat me up over some stupid thing. I don’t even remember what it is thanks to you.”
“Whatever. I don’t know or care. Your just a bit-“
“Hey, I will not have cursing in my office. Just from what I just heard, your in big trouble Kirstie.”
“Me!? I didn’t even do anything.”
“Yes you did you little brat. Look at this poor girl’s face. She’s lucky she didn’t fracture her head.”
“Yeah, well I wish I did.”
“Ok, I’m sick of your insults. Principal’s office, NOW.” Things sure we’re getting heated.

Without another word, the nurse excused Rhiannon and took Kirstie to the principal. Rhiannon grabbed her bag and headed out of the school, getting in her car. She placed her bag on the passengers seat and opened it, pulling you out and placing you on the seat.

“Well, she sure got what she deserved.” You said, a bit uneasy
“Yeah. At least she doesn’t remember you in our fight.”
“Yeah. The last thing I need is her trying to snatch me up.”
“Ok, let’s head to my house and we can figure this all out.”
“Ok, sounds good.”

With that, Rhiannon started the engine and drove back home.
162321121222212.title: A Saving Grace

choices: She stuffs you inbetween her breasts, and begins to jump up and down.
She rushes to the changing rooms, and opens her panties...
16232112122222.content:
"Give me Ant. This is your last warning!" Kirstie shouts, still with Rhiannon positioned in the perfect way to punish her more. "No...", she wispers silently...
"Fine!" Kirstie retorts, and with that, a flash appeared, blinding you for a second. You look around, you're not in Rhiannon's bra anymore, instead, Rhiannon lies on the hard concrete, completely unconscous. Kirstie shouts in victory, "Aha! You're mine now Ant! Ooh, and lovely little Rhiannon as well! I'm going to have so much fun with you...". Those last words chilled you to the bone, and apparently Rhiannon too, who shot bolt upright at the end of her statement.
Kirstie reaches down and grabs the pair of you. "Now, what shall I do first...?".
16232112122222.title: A second victim...

162321122.content:
Kirstie lets go of you and you land on her tongue with a splat. "Oh god! You taste amazing!" she groans, covering you in saliva. You scream as the saliva burns your flesh, but the evil goddess pays no attention to this.
Her huge tongue rolls you around for a while, and you launched onto Kirstie's molar. You quickly move but your left foot is converted to paste by her tooth. Kirstie coos in delight. "Gee, pinch me Ant, am I dreaming?" she laughs as her mouth muscles drag you to the back of her mouth. "I hope you enjoy dissolving slowly down there, make sure you struggle a lot for your favourite person!" she booms. You are tossed down the chute like an unwanted toy, and the bulge in your worn out pants is the last thing you notice before the stomach acid begins to eat away at your brain...
162321122.title: You inevitably become a living snack...

choices: Find her again
That's what the internet is for
You text her
163.content:
I think I am busy at recess too, actually..." you say, and curse yourself for saying it.

"Okay, but is it okay if I visit you at your house?"

You smile internally, SHE WANTS IT, OLD BOY!!! you think. "Sure! See you then, you say, and go to your next class. EEP!! You stop, because you forgot to give her your address!!.

What do you do?
163.title: "I think I am busy at recess too, actually....

info.brief_description: You walk into your High school, and find yourself shrinking rapidly! 120,000+ views!
info.description:
The only rules are:
No gay (lesbian is fine).
No scat.
No male growth.
Please try to use good grammar and spelling. I'll edit typos out of chapters where I notice them.
Keep swearing to a minimum please, for the sake of this site's rating system.
Sex is fine, as long as the characters involved are not minors.
Gore/graphic scenes are fine for the sake of vore/crushing but don't go overboard again for the sake of keeping the story 18+ not GC.
Also bear in mind the ages given for the characters are their ages on the creation date of this story (1 Nov 2009) so if you want to skip forward in time, remember this.

Main Characters:
You: Anthony (often called Ant), 5ft 9in, age 17. You have light brown hair, and you're quite ordinary looking yet also quite athletic. You are pretty smart but also very curious and sometimes stubborn. This has gotten you into trouble many times before.

Mike: 5ft 10in, age 17. Mike has bleached blonde hair and enjoys playing sports. He's your best mate since you were young. He's a laugh to be around and is very loyal to his friends, but can be quite rash and short tempered at times. He refuses to back down when challenged by someone or something.

Beth: 5ft 5in, age 17. She has medium length blonde hair, thick-rimmed glasses, and a full figured hourglass-shaped body. She doesn't really like you. She is known for her unusual and demented behaviour such as grabbing and kissing random people. This has earned her the title of "psycho" from many of your classmates. She is good friends with Suzy and Kirstie.

Emily: 5ft 7in, age 16. She is a smart girl who you get on with very well. She has fiery red hair, a very pretty face, and quite a slim build. She's probably the most laid back person you know, and has a tendency to flirt with you harmlessly. However she often handles unusual situations badly and is also somewhat fickle. She gets on with everyone reasonably well.

Maria: 5ft 4in, age 18. Maria is somewhat small, being quite short and slim, but with a disproportionately large ass. She has a reputation for sleeping around and never having the same boyfriend for more than a week. You don't have much in common with her. She is a lot more intelligent than she likes to let on. She is good friends with Suzy, Kirstie, Whitney and Mike.

Rebecca Blake: 5ft 11in, age 25. Miss Blake is your science teacher. She has jet black-shoulder length hair, curves that would make a lot of models jealous, and is also quite tall. Despite this she often wears tall stiletto heels, giving her a somewhat imposing appearance. It is clear that you're her favourite student, however she tries to treat all classmates fairly. She is mostly personable and friendly, however there is a darker side to her personality.

Suzy: 6ft 6in, age 19. Suzy is an Amazon of a woman with blonde hair, long tree trunk-like legs, a larger build, and large breasts. She cannot stand you and seems to get off on subjugating and humiliating you, often physically and verbally. Despite this you can't help but lust after her looks. She gets on with Kirstie, Beth, Tara, Maria, Izzy, and somehow your friend Emily.

Kirstie: 6ft 4in, age 17. She could almost be the (slightly) shorter, slimmer, nerdier little sister of Suzy. She has dirty-blonde hair and wears large glasses. The only person you know who hates you and hurts you more than Suzy does. She genuinely scares you. Everyone you know is terrified of her at least a little, even people she calls her friends. She hangs out with Suzy, Sapphyre, Beth, Tara, Maria and Rhiannon.

Rhiannon: 6ft 0in, age 17. She has long dark blonde hair and a slim but very fit figure. She is in most of the same classes as you, and you have something of a crush on her (something she seems oblivious to). She's a very naive and sweet girl and probably wouldn't hurt a fly even if she had to. She is a little insecure about her unusual height. Her best friends are Emily, Kirstie, Mike, Ant and Izzy.

Minor Characters:
Izzy: 5ft 7in, age 16. She has frizzy black hair, an eye catching figure, and a mousy but attractive face. She is very obsessed with you, which annoys you most of the time. She doesn't seem to care, though. She can get quite vicious when she sees you with another girl, whether it's a romantic interest or not. You could swear you've seen her hanging around near your house alone even though she lives almost an hour away from you. She is friends with Emily, Rhiannon, Suzy, Kirstie, and Mike.

Danielle: 5ft 6in, age 18. She has dark brown straightened hair and a slim figure with large breasts that she likes to show off. Most of the guys in your school are smitten with her and do whatever she says, although she seems nice enough on the surface. Her closest friends hint that she's not as straightforward and normal as she seems. Emily is her inseparable best friend, but she is also friends with Ant and Mike.

Lex: 5ft 10in, about 22 or 23 years old. She is Danielle's older sister. She has long (dyed) blonde hair and a nice body. She has a very laid back personality and a good sense of humour, but you can't help but feel something is slightly "off" about her. She doesn't attend your school, you've only met her twice before outside of school.

Sapphyre: 5ft 4in, age 18. She has raven hair with blue highlights, and dresses in gothic clothing. You don't know her too well but she seems quite arrogant and narcissistic. A lot of younger girls in the school seem to idolise her. She is somewhat a rival to Whitney, both girls being so popular. You heard somewhere that Sapphyre isn't her real name. She's good friends with Kirstie, Suzy and Beth.

Tara: 5ft 5in, age 17. Tara is a pretty brunette girl who is quite shy and modest. She is on the timid side and tends to follow her friends most of the time instead of being too independent. Unfortunately some people take advantage of her shyness and use it to control her. On her own, she seems friendly and outgoing. She is friends with Suzy and Kirstie who play her like a puppet.

Gwen: 5ft 6in, age 18. She has brown hair and seems to permanently walk with a limp for unknown reasons. She is a friend of yours, but tends to stay out of social circles for the most part. She is kind and funny but can be overly harsh on people sometimes. For this reason lots of people don't like her. To you, she just comes across as misunderstood. Friends with Ant, Mike and Emily.

Whitney: 5ft 4in, age 16. She has dyed hot pink hair. Whitney is very popular and is also very vain and arrogant. You don't really like her. She is always seen wearing expensive designer clothes, and is never without her sunglasses. Despite this she is not bad looking. She seems to rival to Sapphyre for popularity, and they often clash over this subject. Friends with Kirstie, Suzy and Maria.

Chelsea: 5ft 3in, age 17. Chelsea has bleached blonde hair and a gorgeous, curvy body. She's the stereotypical dumb blonde, but with enough intelligence to use her looks to her advantage. She's malicious and nasty to most people, but can be quite pleasant and seductive to people she wants something from. Nearly everyone hates her.

Holly: 5ft 5in, age 18. Holly is a bit of an ordinary girl in both looks and personality. She has medium length brown hair and quite plain features: she is neither beautiful nor ugly. However she keeps to herself and her personality is not well known. She seems to know Mike quite well, but to everyone else she comes across as mysterious and distant.

Use any of the characters in any way, as long as it abides by the rules. Enjoy!
